title: NxtWave - Manager - Business Development/Sales
description:
* NxtWave is one of India's fastest-growing Ed-Tech startups. NxtWave is revolutionizing the 21st-century job market by transforming youth into highly skilled tech professionals irrespective of their educational background with its CCBP 4.0 programs.
 * NxtWave was founded by Rahul Attuluri (Ex Amazon, IIIT Hyderabad), Sashank Reddy (IIT Bombay), and Anupam Pedarla (IIT Kharagpur). In February 2023, NxtWave raised - 275 crore led by Greater Pacific Capital, a leading international private equity firm. The startup is also backed by Orios Ventures, Better Capital, and marquee angels, including founders of some of India's unicorns.
 * NxtWave is an official partner for NSDC, under the Ministry of Skill Development & Entrepreneurship, Govt. of India, and recognized by NASSCOM, Ministry of Commerce and Industry, Govt. of India, and Startup India. The startup has received accolades as 'The Greatest Brand in Education' in a research-based listing by URS Media, a leading international media house.
 * By offering vernacular content and interactive learning, NxtWave is breaking the entry barrier for learning tech skills. Learning in their mother tongue helps learners achieve higher comprehension, deeper attention, longer retention, and greater outcomes.
 * NxtWave now has paid subscribers from 450+ districts across India. In just 2 years, CCBP 4.0 learners have been hired by 1250+ companies including Google, Amazon, Nvidia, Goldman Sachs, Oracle, Deloitte, and more.
 * Scale at which we operate on the tech level (as of February 2023)
 * 370 Cr+ learning minutes spent
 * 69 Cr+ Code Runs
 * 4.2 Bn. + API Requests Handled by our servers
   
   

Know more about NxtWave : https://www.ccbp.in

Read more about us in the news : Economic Times | CNBC | Yourstory | VCCircle

You Are Ideal For This Role, If


 * You can manage a team of counselors that would guide students with their career decisions
 * You can instill empathy in your team to address all queries regarding NxtWave courses for potential learners and help them make a decision faster
 * You have proven experience in driving the outcomes from a sales team in achieving revenue targets
 * You are looking to work in the environment of a high-growth startup
 * You are looking for a managerial role where you also find meaning in your work
   
   

What will you be doing ?


 * Lead a team of Business Development Associates & sales representatives to achieve a given revenue target
 * Continuously monitor and train the team to improve performance and conversions
 * Counseling learning prospects, offering career advice, and providing a sense of how CCBP 4.0 Programs can accelerate their career.
 * Establishing the effectiveness and uniqueness of CCBP 4.0 Programs.
 * Taking responsibility for ensuring the entire sales closing life cycle for your assigned Sales Team. Phone/video calls, product demonstrations, sales closing, and post-sales relationship management fall under this category.
 * Maintaining a detailed database of all the interactions with the leads and providing constant feedback on the quality of the leads to the respective team.
 * Carrying weekly revenue and enrollment targets.
 * Analyzing and sharing active feedback about customer behavior, market demands, and competition with the marketing team
 * Handle escalations and improve customer experience
 * Make propositions, give suggestions, and designate sales targets and job obligations to each team member.
 * Give prompt responses on crucial issues and suggest solutions
   
   

What are we looking for ?


 * Proven experience of 2+ years in managing a sales team
 * An individual with excellent communication skills (written and verbal), interpersonal abilities, and presentation skills.
 * Apart from good English proficiency, individuals with any of the following as native language Telugu
 * Highly Dedicated Individuals who are hardworking and with extreme determination.
 * Sales Experience with the EdTech domain is an additional advantage.
 * People with a strong sense of empathy and great patience.
 * People with a systematic approach to building sales funnels, tracking feedback, prioritizing tasks, and consistently exceeding targets within the deadlines
 * A sales mindset, to effectively communicate NxtWaves offerings to its prospective learners and achieve revenue targets
 * Passion for delivering the highest levels of customer service at all times.
   
   

Languages Known


 * Native speaker of Telugu.
 * Excellent Proficiency in English
   
   

Work Location & Working Days :


 * Work from Office(Hyderabad)
 * 6 Day Week
   
   

CTC Offered


 * Upto 12 LPA Including performance-based incentives
   
   

(ref:updazz.com)

title: Business Development Manager, Mumbai, Chennai
description:
Purpose

To realize business growth, increase market share and meet all defined commercial objectives within the guidelines and time frame of the overall business plan




Role

Generate new business and acquire new Deepsea customers with focus on multi-level & relational sales approach.




Key Responsibilities

 * Accountable for delivering revenue, margin, order intake, and KPI within the assigned account base.
 * Understand and map every touchpoint in Deepsea customer’s buying journey to develop an effective sales strategy.
 * To manage a pipeline with multiple Deepsea accounts within the assigned territory.
 * Lead the opportunities pursue process for all received Request for Quotations (RFQs) and inhouse generated leads, particularly from Competitive Quote Process.
 * Pitches for service contract to consolidate the Deepsea customers’ service business into Radio Holland network.
 * Generates proposals, prepares service contract quotations, and demonstrates value proposition to Deepsea customers.
 * Boost win rates through deploying rigorous sales processes, pricing, contracting and negotiation, to accelerate the growth of all services across the entire service portfolio.
 * Schedule and conduct regular meetings with fleet teams to develop and drive business opportunities.
 * Proactively develop a strong understanding of the fleet operations and priorities for each assigned account.
 * Accountable for maintaining positive, mutually beneficial relationships with fleet teams, particularly at the head of ship management/purchasing level and leverages those relationships to win new business.
 * Determine prioritization of action for multiple assigned accounts based on strategic match (value proposition), sales-pursuing probability, compliance and account risks, all while maintaining a high level of commitment and accountability for assigned accounts.
 * Identify disconnects in service and customer expectations before they become issues, then work with the line manager to correct identified issues.
 * Understand the formal and informal decision-making process within each of the accounts and drive the regular cadence/governance accordingly.
 * Timely resolve the customer issues and challenges as the initial escalation point.
 * Monitor the account management KPI on spot service and trade sales revenue.
 * Documents, validates and tracks leads and opportunities through Customer Relationship Management (CRM) system.
 * Coordinates closely with Global Inside Sales and Global Operations in all aspects of opportunities capture and proposal processes.
 * Ability to travel up to 10 days each month visiting fleet teams face-to-face in a sales capacity.
 * Keep abreast of competition, competitive issues and technology.
 * Strictly comply with, all corporate policies and compliance regulation.
 * To prospect via email, LinkedIn, outbound calls, and attend conferences and events




Requirements

 * Bachelor or master in Business administration
 * 5+ years of related working experience with solid connection with the shipping companies in India.
 * Demonstrate successful track record of achieving US$1 million+ annual quotas.
 * Strategic capabilities
 * Business intelligence
 * Communication and interpersonal skills
 * Negotiation and Persuasion skills
 * Research and analytical skills
 * Strong in networking and relation building
 * Team player
 * Commitment to accuracy, attention to detail and follow-through with a focus on achieving the top standard of customer satisfaction, stress resistance
 * Industry knowledge
 * Product & Service level knowledge

title: Business Development Manager - India
description:
Are you interested in working with a leading education technology player, the global leader in the assessment and certification of professional skills industry with presence in more than 200 countries worldwide? If so, this is the chance to apply now! 📥

PeopleCert is looking for a Business Development Manager who will be responsible to develop strong pipelines and deliver new business in their territory. Through an in-depth understanding of the PeopleCert Group and go-to-market strategy, the successful candidate will establish relationships with key decision makers of training organizations, universities, and corporations in their assigned territory.

As a Business Development Manager, your tasks will include the following:


 * Apply astute skills in account management and employ extensive professional experience in developing and nurturing high-quality business relationships at Senior Executive level
 * Maintain and achieve maximum B2B market penetration of PeopleCert products, implementing a target-driven sales strategy
 * Coordinate various aspects of activity in tandem with the company's operations base and with respect to the local market conditions and culture
 * Plan and organise personal sales strategy by maximising the Return on Time Investment for the territory/segment
 * Monitor own progress against daily/weekly/monthly targets and report accordingly to the Headquarters
 * Facilitate and expedite the resolution of customer problems and complaints, working closely with support teams
 * Participate in trade shows and conventions
   
   

What we look for:


 * Bachelor's degree required. Post-graduate studies is a plus
 * Over 10 years' experience in driving new business development at corporate level, with proven track record in driving successful business development transactions
 * Sound understanding of channel development, strategy selling principles, partnership strategy and consultative selling
 * Superb relationship, communication, and negotiation skills in working with executives, external constituents, and other business functions at all levels of seniority and different cultures
 * Exposure in the Education market, Consulting or Examination / Certification sectors in previous role(s) as well as prior experience in international corporate environments will be considered an asset. Preference will be given to candidates from IT Consulting and/or Technology backgrounds
 * Excellent command of the English language (C2 level certification desired, LanguageCert C2 LTE or C2 IESOL certificate would be a plus)
 * Advanced computer literacy is required. ECDL Advance level certification is desirable. Experience in Microsoft Dynamics CRM or similar software will be considered an asset
   
   

What we offer:


 * Competitive remuneration package
 * Work in an international, dynamic and fun atmosphere
 * Two free vouchers for all certifications from PeopleCert's Portfolio per year for all employees
 * Huge learning experience in using best practices and global environment
 * Constant personal and professional development
 * 100% Virtual Hiring Process
   
   

If you want to become a member of our international, dynamic and agile team that creates world leading software products, then we should certainly like to hear from you!

About PeopleCert

PeopleCert is a global leader in assessment and certification of professional skills, partnering with multi-national organizations and government bodies for the development & delivery of standardized exams. Delivering exams across 200 countries and in 25 languages over its state-of-the-art assessment technology, PeopleCert enables professionals to boost their careers and realize their life ambitions.

Quality, Innovation, Passion, Integrity are the core values which guide everything we do.

Our offices in UK, Greece, and Cyprus boast a culture of diversity, where everyone is different, yet everyone fits in. All of us at PeopleCert are committed to the reflection of the diversity and inclusion of our customers and the communities in which we do business.

Working on Home Office (HO) Secure English Language Tests (SELTs)

Any person who is engaged by PeopleCert to work on the SELT service must undergo a Background Check (the results of which must be acceptable to PeopleCert and the HO) prior to commencing their SELT duties. All SELT personnel will be required to complete a declaration (provided by PeopleCert) where the existence of any criminal record and/or bankruptcy must be declared.

If working on the SELT service in the UK, background checks will include:


 * A basic or enhanced Disclosure Barring Service (DBS) check
 * Right to Work in the UK check (including nationality, identity and place of residence)
 * HO security check (Baseline Personnel Security Standard (BPSS) or Counter Terrorist Check (CTC)
 * Financial background check
 * Employment reference check
 * If working on the SELT service anywhere in the world (outside of the UK) personnel will undergo background checks that are equivalent to those stated for the UK
   
   

In addition, if personnel are required to speak to SELT candidates they must be appropriately skilled in English language and, where SELT services are provided anywhere in the world (outside of the UK), the official language of the relevant country.

All applications will be treated with strict confidentiality.

title: Senior Manager - Business Development
description:
About Halma:




Halma is a global group of life-saving technologies companies, driven by a clear purpose. We are an FTSE 100 company with headquarters in the UK and operations in 23 countries, including regional hubs in India, China, Brazil, and the US.




Our diverse group of nearly 50 global companies specialize in market leading technologies that push the boundaries of science and technology.




For the last 42 years, the combination of our purpose, strategy, people, DNA and sustainable business model has resulted in record long-term growth in revenues and profits and an increase in dividend by ≥ 5% every year– an achievement unrivalled by any company listed on the London Stock Exchange.




Halma India:




Halma India is a subsidiary of Halma International which operates as a hub for incubating local units of international group companies. The hub provides resources for market development, technical services, software development and engineering design. It also provides guidance on India market information, business strategy start-up and statutory facilitation, payroll administration, recruitment, marketing and PR, training and development.




Halma India hub also acts as a principal distributor to stock and trade the products of International Group Companies in India. In future, the hub will also support assembly and manufacturing services. In the long run, as all companies start their own local units, Halma India will continue to guide and govern the group in India.




Why join us?




We offer a safe and respectful workplace, where everyone can be who they ‘REALLY’ are, feel free to bring their whole selves to work and use their unique talents, knowledge, expertise, experiences, and backgrounds to create meaningful outcomes.




We nurture entrepreneurial spirits and empower them to think beyond the possibilities, to discover, shape and build their own unique stories. We promote and support non-linear career growth for the right talent.




We are simple, humble, and approachable, and we believe in leadership at all levels to bring our purpose to life. Everyone at Halma India makes an impact, and so do you when you join us!




About HFI:




HFI is a new business unit under the Halma Safety sector, created to deliver simplified safety solutions to India and beyond.



As HFI, we manufacture fire safety products and solutions, and provide consultancy, training, and full technical support, so that you always have peace of mind in knowing that your assets are given the best possible protection from fire.



Our solutions are designed and manufactured to cater to the unique needs of customers in:

Fire Detection, Alarm & control, Automatic fire detection & suppression, Specialist detection




Responsibilities




 * Devise an effective BD strategy for the short and long-term sales growth.
 * Build market position by locating, developing, defining & closing business.
 * relationships.
 * Work with Regulatory bodies, Industry Associations
 * Work closely with consultants and architects, building design and specifications.
 * Planning and overseeing new market initiatives.
 * Examine risks and potentials for the business opportunities.
 * Ownership of sales in certain product categories
 * Developing quotes and proposals for customers and consultants
 * Work closely with Marketing and Sales teams
 * Manage key end customer accounts.




Critical Success factors:




 * Ability to network and develop strong relationships across organizations.
 * Strong knowledge of fire industry and key applications
 * Effective business planning, forecasting and execution
 * Strong communication skills
 * Open to new challenges, diverse roles, manage complex tasks
 * Ability to flourish with minimal guidance, be proactive, and handle uncertainty.
 * Critical thinker and problem solver




Qualifications:




 * Engineering graduate (B. Tech / B.E.) from premier institution, preferably in Electronics / Electrical
 * MBA from reputed institution will be an advantage.




Experience:




 * Total work experience: 12 - 15 years
 * At least 5-7 years of experience at mid-level position in Sales and Business Development
sector: Appliances, Electrical, and Electronics Manufacturing, Electrical Equipment Manufacturing, and Fire Protection

title: Business Development Executive
description:
We are looking for a Business Development Representative to act as the liaison between our Marketing and Sales teams. Your role will be to seek new business opportunities by contacting and developing relationships with potential customers.

To be successful in this role, you should have previous experience developing leads from marketing campaigns and meeting sales quotas. You will use your communication skills to cultivate strong relationships with customers, from first contact until you close the deal. You will also ensure proper after-sales service. If you are motivated and results-driven, and enjoy working in a team environment, we’d like to meet you.

Ultimately, you will boost sales and contribute to our long-term business growth.

Responsibilities


 * Qualify leads from marketing campaigns as sales opportunities
 * Contact potential clients through cold calls and emails
 * Present our company to potential clients
 * Identify client needs and suggest appropriate products/services
 * Customize product solutions to increase customer satisfaction
 * Build long-term trusting relationships with clients
 * Proactively seek new business opportunities in the market
 * Set up meetings or calls between (prospective) clients and Account Executives
 * Report to the Business Development Manager on (weekly/monthly/quarterly) sales results
 * Stay up-to-date with new products/services and new pricing/payment plans
   
   

Requirements And Skills


 * Proven work experience as a Business Development Representative, Sales Account Executive or similar role
 * Hands-on experience with multiple sales techniques (including cold calls)
 * Track record of achieving sales quotas
 * Experience with CRM software (e.g. Salesforce)
 * Familiarity with MS Excel (analyzing spreadsheets and charts)
 * Understanding of sales performance metrics
 * Excellent communication and negotiation skills
 * Ability to deliver engaging presentations
 * BSc degree in Marketing, Business Administration or relevant field
   
   

Skills: sales,marketing,networking,business development,communication,presentation,customer service,negotiation,time management,crm,lead generation,market research,analytical,microsoft office,excel,powerpoint,product knowledge,creativity

title: Associate Director / Director in Business Development (AI/ML)
description:
Company Description

Calsoft is a leading technology-first partner providing digital and product engineering services with over 25 years of experience.



Role Description

This is a full-time on-site role for an Associate Director / Director in Business Development for Calsoft's new Gen AI Practice. This is a new practice and an opportunity to build and be part of a team from grounds-up. They will be responsible for hiring and leading an inside sales team of 2-3 people. The Associate Director will be located in Pune or Bengaluru, and have the following responsibilities:



Responsibilities

 * Responsible for business development and sales of Calsoft’s AI practice.
 * Be responsible for a revenue target at a personal and team level.
 * Be hands-on manager, drive the sales team, and ensure their productivity and efficiency in meeting the target.
 * Be responsible for hands-on calling, lead generation and closing of new accounts to meet the revenue goals.
 * Work in collaboration with the engineering and presales teams.
 * Note: The activities performed in this scope are prospecting for new business, detailed qualification of sales opportunities, management of the sales cycle, and negotiation of contracts and agreements. Develop and implement sales strategies keeping short- and long-term goals in perspective.



Qualifications

 * Strong leadership, management, and collaboration skills
 * Prior experience selling AI or ML services preferred
 * Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
 * Should have managed an inside sales team from India but should be hands on with experience as an IC
 * Should have sold into US and Europe market
 * Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
 * Degree in Computer Science or related field preferred

title: Business Development Manager
description:
About the job




Who We Are




We are Clipio, a company focussed on creating video assets that have high impact on general awareness, to be used to generate business growth.




Your Role, Collaboration & Team




As a Business Development Manager - you’ll work as part of a global, highly motivated sales team focussed on new account acquisition. You will be a master of lead gen, enjoy attending events and networking opportunities and help technology brands utilise Clipio to solve the complexities associated with content creation at scale.




The Business Development Manager reports to the CGO, and requires a motivated self-starter to hit the ground running. The ideal candidate will have a winning attitude and know how to prospect and open doors deep within tech brands. A generous base package, tools of trade, employee benefits scheme and an exciting incentive program is on offer for the right candidate. This is a national role and will involve domestic travel from time to time.




What You'll Love Doing




 * Develop and execute sales strategies to acquire new businesses and winback churned accounts.
 * Grow our regional client base, drive new business, and build close and trusted relationships with Brands
 * Establish and build business relationships, effectively communicating Clipio's value proposition to Brands
 * Understand the customer and their video content requirements and represent Clipio as a strategic partner to them
 * Successfully meet sales revenue goals and maintain growth in sales activity month over month
 * Proactively maintain account plans, systems, and tools with pipeline activity
 * Attend industry events and networking sessions to generate leads and develop relationships.
 * You’ll love social selling and creating thought leadership content to educate new prospects




Who you are




 * Strong experience in new business acquisition, advertising, content creation or media, and selling to tech brands.
 * Go-getter - once you have a goal, there’s no stopping you!
 * Passion for the field. For you to contribute significantly to our mission, you need to be passionate about your job. This is the right opportunity for you if you find the idea of unearthing and acquiring new Brands and building strong partnerships extremely exciting - and you’ll take that enthusiasm to every aspect of the job
 * Someone with a strong sense of urgency, exceptional organizational skills, and natural relationship-building ability; this is a dynamic and fast-paced role!Strong knowledge of video content production and social video ecosystem
 * A natural networker with strong industry relationships within the space
 * Exceptional interpersonal and presentation skills.




Our Values




 * Be the Customer. Know, listen and live the experience of the customer. Think, talk, see, and ask like the customer. Then create value and build trust with the customer.
 * Own it. We are all owners. We focus on the core problems and opportunities that drive sustained success. We agree on a path, own the outcome, and do whatever it takes together.
 * Focus on what matters. Know the goals, know the numbers, know what matters, and prioritize. Visualize it for everyone so that you can align the team and make it happen.
 * Be Courageous. Have the courage to drive change for the business and don’t be afraid to take a risk and feel the burn.

title: Business Development Executive Adfors
companyName: Dubai Jobs, Gulf Jobs, Jobs in Dubai, Qatar, Kuwait - Boyen Haddin & The Giant HR Consultant
description:
Organizational Overview




Adfors




ADFORS is the world leader in geotextiles and glass fiber technical fabrics for applications in construction and industrial markets. It offers solutions based on a complete range of textile & coating technologies using fiberglass yarns, synthetic fibers, and natural fibers. Its products include glass fiber mesh for exterior wall insulation, wall coverings, joint tapes, glass mats for thermal insulation (HKO) for automotive and industrial application, insect screens, staple fibers, and road reinforcement grids. The Geotex business has a manufacturing facility in Bangalore and produces a range of reinforcement products for roads, runways, coal mines, and quarries for the domestic and APAC market.




P Oducts




In India, ADFORS manufactures polyester mesh for use in coal mining operations. The product is coated with a specialized fire-retardant coating, for safety in enclosed locations like coal mines. The use of polyester mesh occurs at the end stage of coal recovery, in an operation called salvage. The fabric is installed on the roof of the coal mine so that various mining equipments can be extracted safely. Since the environment is extremely flammable, ADFORS Mining Mesh is coated with a specialized fire-retardant to deter progression of fire.




In addition to the above, ADFORS India supplies the following products:




Insect Screens: The mainstay product is the woven fiberglass insect screens manufactured at our state of the art plant in Mexico. These are available in 4 different colors and different roll width starting from 3ft to 8ft. In addition to the standard fiberglass mesh, specialty screens such as Stiff Screen, Vision Perfect, Pet Resistant, Sun Guard, Extra Strength, and Small Insect screens are also available.




Novelio Wall Coverings: The product is an exclusive range of glass fiber wallcoverings which are manufactured by Saint-Gobain ADFORS in Czech Republic. The wall covering is essentially a fabric woven from glass yarns in an array of attractive textured patterns. After preparing the wall surface, the wall covering is installed with a glue and can be painted with any water based paint, with a color of choice, suiting the theme and d cor of the living space.




GlasGrid Pavement Reinforcement Grids: Geotex business under ADFORS deals in pavement reinforcement products which have been used in highway/runway construction or maintenance works over the last 40 years in more than 64 countries. GlasGrid is a prominent product in the Geotex range which is being successfully used in India since the last 15 years in projects like PPP Airports, Civil Airports, Defence Airfields, National Highways/Elevated projects, and other important stretches under state bodies like PWD, state road departments etc. Our road reinforcement products are used as 'Bitumen Reinforcement Interlayer' which prevents reflective cracking and enhances fatigue performance, thus increasing the service life of the pavement. GlasGrid Pavement Reinforcement Grids retard reflective cracking by a factor of 2 to 3 times by turning crack stresses horizontally to dissipate the stress.




Job Title




Business Development Executive- Adfors




Grade




M11




Designation




Executive




Department




Sales and Marketing




Reporting to




Business Development Manager- Adfors




Location




Coimbatore




Qualification




BE/ B.Tech (Not Mandatory) or MBA




Experience




2-3y




JOB PURPOSE




Organization Perspective




To ensure organization, customer and product requirements are met and continually improve the quality systems.




Customer perspective




To understand the customer requirements related to product, quality system and ensure the implementation of the requirements in the organization




GEOGRAPHICAL TERRITORY Coimbatore and Kerala POSITION SUMMARY To develop market and business for our Adfors- Construction/interior LOB (Product- Novelio & Insect Screen) KEY RESPONSIBILITIES




 * Achieving the budget & overall management of sales in the region
 * Hunting for new projects, getting the product specified and building relationships with architects, interior designers, influencers, builders and distributors
 * Augment sales through introduction of new products
 * Augment distribution network and additional commercial channels for retail
 * Creation of data base, MIS, competition information
 * Define strategy for responsible products in terms of further downstream activities to ensure sustainable growth - manage local resources to ensure all above goals




Coordination With Other Departments




Internal Sales team, marketing team, Customer Service and Logistics




External Dealers, Distributors, Interior Designers, Architects




Skills




Functional
 * 
    * Strong experience in project and channel sales and networking with architects, builders and distributors
    * Knowledge/experience in retail organization setup and management.
    * Knowledge on Construction products and home fittings markets
    * High level of initiative, assertive and a self-driven professional
    * Exposure to Project & retail sales /architects / interior Designers / contractors / Builders / and business development Construction/interior LOB.

title: Manager Business Development - International Programs
description:
About T-Hub:




T-Hub (Technology Hub) is an innovation hub and ecosystem enabler. Based out of Hyderabad, India, T-Hub leads India’s pioneering innovation ecosystem and is the world’s largest innovation campus. Over the six years, T-Hub has pivoted around the 6Ms (Mentors, Market, Motivation, Manpower, Money, Methodologies) and 2Ps (Partnerships and Policy Advisory) frameworks with a mission of driving results and collaboration for entrepreneurs’ success. It has delivered 100+ innovation programs so far, creating an impact for startups, corporations, and other innovation ecosystems. Since its inception, it has provided over 2000 national and international startups with access to better technology, talent, mentors, customers, corporations, investors, and government agencies. Many entrepreneurs from the USA, Canada, the UK, Australia, and Germany are accessing the Indian market through T-Hub. We have incubated 200+ international startups and provided international market access to 100+ Indian startups through our international platform called "T-Bridge.”. T-Bridge engages mentors, corporations, startups, incubators and accelerators, universities, and government organizations to build innovation bridges between India and other geographies.




Roles & responsibilities:

Success in this role requires a combination of leadership skills, strategic thinking, and a deep understanding of the global innovation ecosystem. Your ability to foster collaboration, create opportunities for startups, and navigate the complexities of international business development will play a crucial role in the success of the innovation hub and the startups it supports




Client Acquisition:

 * Identify and target potential clients, including startups, corporations, and government entities, for incubation services.
 * Develop and implement strategies to attract a diverse range of startups to the T-Hub.

Sales Strategy:

 * Develop and execute a comprehensive international sales strategy aligned with the T-Hub's goals.
 * Analyze market trends and competition to refine the sales approach.

Client Relationship Management:

 * Build and maintain strong relationships with existing and potential clients.
 * Understand the needs of startups and other clients, ensuring a high level of satisfaction.

Product Knowledge:

 * Have a deep understanding of the T-Hub's programs and services.
 * Effectively communicate the value proposition to prospective clients.

Sales Presentations:

 * Create compelling sales presentations and materials showcasing the benefits of joining the T-Hub.
 * Conduct pitches and presentations to each potential client.

Proposal Development:

 * Work with the T-Hub's leadership and program managers to develop customized proposals for each potential client.
 * Tailor proposals to address the unique needs and goals of each startup or client.

International Expansion Support:

 * Collaborate with startups to understand their international expansion plans.
 * Highlight T-Hub's support in facilitating global growth for startups.

Sales Reporting:

 * Track and report on sales performance metrics.
 * Provide regular updates to the leadership team on sales activities, pipelines, and achievements.

Networking:

 * Attend industry events, conferences, and networking forums to generate leads and promote the T-Hub's services.
 * Build and leverage a strong professional network to drive sales opportunities.

Contract Negotiation:

 * Negotiate contract terms and conditions with clients.
 * Ensure agreements are mutually beneficial and align with the T-Hub's goals.

Global Ecosystem Mapping:

· Identify and understand key players, trends, and resources in the global startup and innovation ecosystem.

· Establish and nurture partnerships with international innovation hubs, accelerators, and industry associations.

Collaboration with Internal Teams:

 * Collaborate with program managers, marketing, and other internal teams to ensure a cohesive and effective approach.
 * Share client feedback and insights to enhance program offerings.

Team Leadership:

· Lead and manage a team of international business development professionals.

· Provide guidance, mentorship, and support to team members to ensure alignment with overall business development goals.

Partnership Development:

· Identify and foster strategic partnerships with global corporations, investors, and governmental organizations.

· Collaborate with internal and external stakeholders to create opportunities for startups within the hub.




Qualifications:

· A bachelor’s degree in business or related major

· 6–8 years experience in a business incubator, international sales, a start-up advisory, or any kind of entrepreneurial experience

· Experience in any one or two sectors or domains like sustainability, mobility, health care, fintech, etc. would be an added advantage.

· Strong working knowledge of Microsoft Office, Excel, and presentations.




Skills

· Understanding of Startup Ecosystems: In-depth knowledge of the global startup ecosystem, including key players, trends, and emerging markets.

· Networking and Relationship Building: exceptional networking skills to connect with startups, investors, mentors, and other stakeholders.

· Sales and Negotiation: Proven track record in sales and negotiation, particularly in a B2B context.

· Communication Skills: Excellent verbal and written communication skills for effective client interactions and presentations.

· Strategic Thinking: Ability to think strategically and align sales efforts with the overall goals of the T-Hub.

· Relationship Building: Strong relationship-building skills to foster partnerships with startups, corporations, and other stakeholders.

· Adaptability: flexibility to adapt to the evolving needs of clients and the startup ecosystem.

· Results-oriented: demonstrated ability to meet and exceed sales targets.

· International Business Acumen: Understanding international business practices and the challenges associated with global expansion.

· Team Collaboration: Ability to work collaboratively with internal teams and stakeholders.

· Innovation Awareness: Awareness and appreciation of innovation trends and the startup landscape.

· Cross-Cultural Competence: Cultural sensitivity and adaptability for working with startups from diverse backgrounds.

title: International Business Development Manager
description:
About Us:

Since 2015, Masscom Corp has focused on providing high-quality services at a reasonable cost to start-ups and mid-scale businesses. While we have a few “enterprise scale” organizations to name in our client roster, our primary focus remains small to medium scale businesses especially start-ups. Given such a focus, we truly understand the day-to-day challenges in delivering technology solutions to this segment.

 

Our extensive array of services helps our customers leverage next-generation technologies to build, transform and manage their IT operations as a natural extension to their in-house teams.

 

We provide a unique mix of domain expertise of cutting-edge Digital Product Engineering, Infrastructure Engineering and Support Services to keep up with day-to-day operations.

 

Overview of the position: 

The International Business Development Manager will be responsible for identifying and pursuing new business opportunities, developing and implementing sales strategies, building and maintaining relationships in the US IT market. Work closely with cross-functional teams to ensure maximum customer satisfaction. This role requires strong communication skills, industry knowledge, and a proven track record in software international business development / sales.




Responsibilities:

 * Lead generation of potential Clients from USA, Canada, UK, Europe and Australia Market.
 * Market Research on the Territories assigned
 * Prospect, educate, qualify, and generate interest for international sales opportunities
 * Follow up with prospective clients within our speciality services in international market.
 * Develop and implement effective strategies to identify and engage potential international clients through online research, networking events, and industry partnerships.
 * Leverage LinkedIn to its fullest potential, creating a strong professional presence, cultivating connections, and strategically positioning the company for business opportunities.

title: Business Development Manager, , LPA Offline Merchants
description:
Description

Our vision is to make Amazon pay the most trusted, convenient and rewarding way for our customers and merchants to transact. We want to be the most preferred instrument when a customer and merchant transact, whether in-store or online. To enable this vision, we have enabled a selection of instruments such as Apay Balance, Gift cards, UPI, Cobranded Credit cards for customers and a vast selection of use cases that customers frequent every day.

Our offline payments business is an offshoot of that uber vision for Amazon Pay. Our vision is to simplify in-store payments for customers & merchants and drive digitization of SMBs. To realize this vision, one of our missions is to build India's largest merchant selection along-with an independently profitable merchant business. We aim to enable 30MM merchants to accept Amazon pay by year 2025. We will make Amazon pay on every merchant desk a possibility. This acceptance would span a) large organized stores such as Shoppers stop, Big bazaar, More etc. b) local/regional brands such as Kanti sweets, Paradise biryani, Wow Momo, Ratnadeep stores etc and c) long tail merchants (mom and pop kirana stores, vendors) in every nook and corner of this country. Achieving this vision requires a large resource pool on the field that solicits and onboards merchants and a corresponding organization that manages this resource pool along with state-of-the art customer and merchant engagement strategy, processes and tools.

To achieve these, we are looking for an ambitious L5 sales and business development leader who is passionate about building businesses at scale.

This individual will be our ambassador with the external merchant ecosystem and will be responsible for conceptualizing, pitching and on boarding strategically holdout selection and leveraging ongoing relationship with partner merchants. S/he will have a direct and visible impact on the long-term success of various businesses across Amazon.in.

This role has direct exposure to senior leaders in Amazon and requires highly developed thought-leadership, ability to pitch new concepts to senior stakeholders, great analytical skills, relationship management and strategic negotiation skills. This is an individual contributor role based in Bangalore, and is a part of LPA Offline Merchants Team, Amazon Pay.

Key job responsibilities


 * Key relationship management with the largest offline merchants in India. Driving negotiations to onboard key holdout selection.
 * Stakeholder management with EUC Teams, finance, marketing and rewards teams to drive common goals for Amazon Pay and the merchants
 * Drive top to top leadership workshops to drive and firm up the annual/quarterly joint business plan
 * Drive monetization opportunities for Reward Ads with merchants
   
   

We are open to hiring candidates to work out of one of the following locations:

Bengaluru, KA, IND

Basic Qualifications


 * 3+ years of business development, partnership management, or sourcing new business experience
 * 3+ years of developing, negotiating and executing business agreements experience
 * Bachelor's degree
 * Experience with sales CRM tools such as Salesforce or similar software
 * Experience in setting up and managing a sales pipeline
   
   

Preferred Qualifications


 * Experience interpreting data and making business recommendations
   
   
   

Company - Amazon Pay (India) Private Limited

title: Business Development Manager
description:

Location: Gurugram, Haryana

Job Type: Full-time




Experience: 2-5 years in Business Development / B2B Sales / Partner Management




About:

Our client is a dynamic and rapidly growing financial services firm revolutionising the CleanTech (EVs, Solar, Sustainable Materials etc) lending landscape. The company specializes in providing innovative financing solutions to customers through strategic partnerships with various companies and startups. The company is looking for a motivated and experienced Business Development Manager to join our team and drive financing through partners in a B2B setup.




Key Responsibilities:




Partner Identification and Onboarding:

 * Identify potential partner companies and startups in CleanTech industries.
 * Establish and nurture relationships with key decision-makers within partner organizations.
 * Lead the onboarding process, ensuring seamless integration of partners into our lending ecosystem.




Strategic Partnership Development:

 * Collaborate with partners to understand their business needs and objectives.
 * Develop customized financing solutions that align with the goals of both the partner and our company.
 * Negotiate and finalize partnership agreements, ensuring mutually beneficial terms.




Cross-functional Collaboration:

 * Work closely with internal teams, including product development, marketing, and operations, to align partner strategies with overall business objectives.
 * Collaborate with the risk management team to assess and mitigate potential financial risks associated with partner collaborations.




Performance Monitoring and Optimization:

 * Track and analyze key performance indicators related to partner relationships and financing activities.
 * Identify opportunities for optimization and growth within existing partnerships.
 * Provide regular reports and updates to the leadership team on partnership performance.




Qualifications:

 * Bachelor's degree in Business, Finance, Technology or a related field.
 * Proven track record in partner management / B2B Sales roles, with 2-5 years of relevant work experience.
 * Strong negotiation and communication skills.
 * Understanding of financial products and services.
 * Ability to thrive in a fast-paced and dynamic work environment.

Perks and Benefits:

 * Competitive salary with performance-based incentives.
 * Health and wellness programs.
 * Opportunities for career advancement in a rapidly growing company.
 * Collaborative and inclusive work culture.




If you are a results-driven individual with a passion for business development and partner management, we invite you to apply for this exciting opportunity. Join us in driving positive change through strategic partnerships in the CleanTech industry!

title: Business Development Manager - South India
description:
MODIFI’s mission is to help business sellers and buyers around the world grow through innovative solutions in global payments, trade financing and trade management services.

We are looking for an exceptional Business Development Manager to join MODIFI's business development and sales team in India and support MODIFI in its mission to change the world of international trade.

Your impact:


 * We are looking for a passionate and results-oriented individual
 * You will be responsible for acquiring new customers in the Indian market through various channels such as customer meetings, industry events, calling, email and relevant digital channels
 * You are a hunter, who rolls up his / her sleeves and sniffs out opportunities, taking cases through the entire sales cycle from start to finish
 * Build a strong direct sales funnel to make MODIFI the leader in Trade Finance for SMEs in India
 * Team up with global Sales & Business development teams in other countries to exploit cross-selling opportunities (with our direct customers or the counterparts of customers)
 * Be extremely results driven, exceeding ambitious targets (financial, customer satisfaction, operational) and taking MODIFI to the next level
 * Partner with cross functional teams across Product, Marketing, Finance, Legal and Risk to find solutions and close deals
 * Be the voice of the customer and engage with Product teams to drive product localization and improvements
 * Be a team player, contributing towards broad company goals in a world-class team with a performance- and people-driven culture
   
   

Requirements


 * At least 8+ years of experience working in a high pressure sales environment. Background in Trade Finance and banking & financial services would be a major positive point.
 * A hungry, infectious personality: We’re looking for someone determined to win and with the resourcefulness to achieve it. Someone with a positive attitude and a “can do” spirit
 * Experience working in a B2B environment.
 * Having a network of exporters and channel partners
 * Fluent English
 * Passion for small and medium-sized businesses, international trade and development and how digital trade finance can create significant growth for such businesses
 * Ability to influence C-level executives as well as passionate owners of small and medium-sized businesses
 * Proven ability to work with and influence cross-functional teams and departments
 * Critical thinking and strong decision-making abilities
 * Comfortable operating in a fast-paced and ever-changing dynamic environment
   
   

Benefits

Why MODIFI? Because we rock!


 * Diversity is more than a word to us - join a company with team mates from 16+ different nationalities and backgrounds
 * The world is your oyster - we have networks around the globe with offices in Amsterdam, Berlin, Delhi, Dhaka, Dubai, Hongkong, Mumbai, Shenzhen, Singapore
 * We care about the environment - that’s why we commit to a clear understanding of our CO2 footprint and shall reach neutrality in 2023
 * You want to get to know your colleagues better?! We organize regular gatherings, events and parties
 * Many perks like a cultural day, personal training, language course and more
 * TEAM - Together Everyone Achieves More
 * At MODIFI we have a very hands-on mindset, giving our people the chance to grow with their responsibilities
 * Think big. Think bigger! Think 10x!
 * We live by our values ‘own your actions’, ‘grow together’ and ‘make it happen’
   
   

Location Preference:

Chennai / Bangalore / Hyderabad

About Us

Here at MODIFI we are building the next-generation global trade payment platform. Since our start in 2018, we have been growing extensively and today we’re ready to move to the next level. MODIFI is the right place to make global trade happen as we believe that international trade drives global development.

Our brilliant multicultural team operates internationally in more than 11 countries. No matter your religion, sexual orientation, age, gender, origin or relationship status; we encourage everyone to be their authentic selves.

We are looking for the most talented people with an attitude to win any battle. Are you passionate about solving problems and ready to conquer the world? Sounds interesting? Yes! So, you belong with us. Send us your CV today!

title: Director, Business Development Leader
description:
Company Description

Visa is a world leader in payments and technology, with over 259 billion payments transactions flowing safely between consumers, merchants, financial institutions, and government entities in more than 200 countries and territories each year. Our mission is to connect the world through the most innovative, convenient, reliable, and secure payments network, enabling individuals, businesses, and economies to thrive while driven by a common purpose – to uplift everyone, everywhere by being the best way to pay and be paid.

Make an impact with a purpose-driven industry leader. Join us today and experience

Job Description

Team Summary

The Business Development team at Visa is at the forefront of client relationship management and responsible both for bringing new client partnerships to Visa, as also to execute on new business opportunities with existing clients. Aligning the strategic objectives of Visa with those of the client and working with client teams across functions to arrive at common goals is a key deliverable. This team comprises self-motivated and highly driven individuals who excel with partners, work collaboratively with other Visa colleagues and have superior project management skills. Being the face of Visa with industry participants gives them an opportunity to work with a myriad set of organizations such as commercial banks, NBFCs, SFBs, payment banks and increasingly with Fintechs. The team is divided into verticals – Centres of Excellence (COE) – based on client size and type. This is an Individual Contributor role reporting in to the head of one of these COEs, who in turn reports into the Head-Business Development for Visa India.

What a Director, Business Development Leader does at Visa:


 * Responsible for business development and delivery of account plans across a set FI accounts, adopts a consultative selling process to identify new opportunities, make client pitches, structure commercial proposals to acquire and lock-in Visa share
 * Executes the product development strategy across core, digital, network and data products
 * Embeds Visa capabilities across Risk, Visa Consulting/Advisory, Marketing etc. to grow VAS revenue
 * Be the Voice of Visa in the client, provide thought-leadership via sharing of industry trends, regional/global best-practices, new technologies and use-cases etc.
 * Improves Client Satisfaction rating through on-going relationship management
   
   

Key Result Areas:


 * Improvement in Visa’s share in client’s credit/debit/prepaid lines of business, as applicable
 * Structuring and ongoing performance tracking of commercial proposals offered to client
 * Engagement across levels and functions within client to identify opportunities ‘below the waterline’ and embed Visa solutions & capabilities to drive volumes on new-flows and VAS.
 * Demonstrate a One-Visa approach across functions viz. Client Support Services, Brand / Marketing, VCA, Risk to support clients and deliver added value
   
   

Key Performance Indicators


 * Visa’s share in client across issuance/PV metrics
 * Revenue-driver performance across Cards in Force, Domestic/Cross border transactions, PV/ITV
 * Net Revenue & VAS Revenue
 * Share of new flows
 * Client Satisfaction scores
   
   

Why this is important to Visa

Attacking competition portfolios to gain market share, is key to Visa’s strategy of increasing card credentials and card usage in the country, and helps to build an inherent preference for Visa amongst other ecosystem stakeholders viz. FI clients, Fintechs, merchants, acquirers, processors etc. as well as, creating a network effect. This role offers the incumbent an exciting and enriching learning experience and an opportunity to meaningfully contribute to market share gains and incremental net revenue achievement.

Projects you will be a part of:


 * Ongoing projects relating to CVP development, co-creation & co-marketing initiatives, portfolio optimization, risk management, GTM strategies for new products & solutions
   
   

This is a hybrid position. Hybrid employees can alternate time between both remote and office. Employees in hybrid roles are expected to work from the office two days a week, Tuesdays and Wednesdays with a general guidepost of being in the office 50% of the time based on business needs.

Qualifications

What you will need:


 * Recognized degree preferably in Business Management
 * 10+ years of account management, B2B sales, or strategy/business consulting experience.
 * Good understanding of payments domain and country landscape
 * Strong collaboration and communications skills and good executive presence
 * Strong understanding of financials to drive client and Visa profitability metrics
 * Strong analytical, negotiation and deal structuring skills
 * Demonstrated program management proficiency and strong result-orientation
   
   

Additional Information

Visa is an EEO Employer. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability or protected veteran status. Visa will also consider for employment qualified applicants with criminal histories in a manner consistent with EEOC guidelines and applicable local law.

Technical/manufacturing competency is preferred; must have technical aptitude and ability to quickly learn technical concepts.

title: Business Development Manager
description:

About Us:

Future Market Insights (FMI) is a premier provider of syndicated research reports, custom research reports, and consulting services. We deliver a complete packaged solution, which combines current market intelligence, statistical anecdotes, technology inputs, valuable growth insights, aerial view of the competitive framework, and future market trends. Our offerings cover broad spectrum of industries including Chemicals, Materials, Energy, Technology, Healthcare, and Retail. We have a global presence with delivery centers across India specializing in providing global research reports and country research reports. FMI is headquartered out of Dubai, U.A.E., with a state-of-the-art delivery center located in Pune, India.  * Ability to work effectively in a team and independently
 * Strong organizational and time management skills
 * Drafting email campaigns, client proposals, agreements and additional business documents/presentations required for sales/prospecting purpose.

title: Product Manager
description:
Company Description

Tesco Bengaluru: We are a multi-disciplinary team creating a sustainable competitive advantage for Tesco by standardising processes, delivering cost savings, enabling agility, providing cutting-edge technological solutions and empowering our colleagues to do ever more for our customers. With cross-functional expertise in Global Business Services and Retail Technology & Engineering, a wide network of teams and strong governance we reduce complexity thereby offering high quality services for our customers. Tesco Bengaluru, established in 2004 to enable standardisation and build centralised capabilities and competencies, makes the experience better for our millions of customers worldwide and simpler for over 4,40,000 colleagues.

Tesco Technology consists of people from a number of different backgrounds, but having a common purpose to serve our shoppers a little better every day with our retail technological solutions. We shared a common interest in harnessing innovations in technology to enhance their shopping experience at Tesco stores. Whether making products, software or systems, our teams focuses on various aspects from taking strategic ownership of the architecture to delivering technological solutions such as design, testing, deployment, infrastructure, operation and security of the systems to ensure agile, smooth and safe operations. These help us to deliver the maximum business impact. Teams refine their internal processes to best fit their own needs, working to build core capabilities in application and services. We collaborate globally across teams to build end-to-end customer-facing solutions, as well as to share knowledge, experience, tools and techniques.

At Tesco, inclusion means that Everyone?s Welcome. Everyone is treated fairly and with respect; by valuing individuality and uniqueness we create a sense of belonging.

Diversity and inclusion have always been at the heart of Tesco. It is embedded in our values: we treat people how they want to be treated. We always want our colleagues to feel they can be themselves at work and we are committed to helping them be at their best.

Across the Tesco group we are building an inclusive workplace, a place to actively celebrate the cultures, personalities and preferences of our colleagues ? who in turn help to build the success of our business and reflect the diversity of the communities we serve.

Job Description

Job Introduction

The Experience API (xAPI) team’s mission is to be the primary information delivery backbone for digital experiences across Tesco Customer; Colleague and Supplier.

The xAPI powers Tesco’s digital shopping experience; enabling Tesco customers to shop across a range of applications and devices including websites; mobile apps; tablets; voice assistants; in-store tills; and scan-as-you-shop handsets. Supporting UK; ROI and CE markets; the xAPI connects other API services such as Identity; Customer Order; Digital Content; Search and Recommendations; Contact; Transport; Address and Payment; and many more.

The xAPI platform is an orchestration and abstraction layer that provides a GraphQL based ‘Experience API’ interface that enables ease of integration between Tesco’s front-end applications and back-end services. Leveraging GraphQL; the xAPI allows our customer facing teams to specify the data they need; making it easier to aggregate requirements from multiple sources across Tesco. Our success is the difference between millions of happy customers or millions of missed opportunities.

The product engineering culture at Tesco focusses on problem solving and not on solution led outcomes. We aim to balance an empowered environment where teams have end to end ownership and decision making; alongside standards; guidance and paved roads which minimise re-learning and duplication.

As the Product Manager for xAPI product; you will be responsible for defining the product strategy and roadmap. Leading the product development efforts; you will craft the strategy from the outcomes expected; using the Agile product development methodology.

You will work with the business teams to understand customer needs and translate them into product requirements. You will co-ordinate with your engineering team to prioritise initiatives and plan business and platform features; thereby iteratively improving both the functionality and usability of your product; setting up for success.

The xAPI team is part of the Engineering Effectiveness (EE) team whose mission is to ensure developers spend more time delivering value and less time worrying about underlying systems while improving their standards and practices in a light touch way.

Main Responsibilities


 * Proactively partner with peers and senior stakeholders to evolve the future direction of the xAPI as part of the wider business strategy
 * Protect the long-term direction through the effective decisions you agree with your customers.
 * Understand key user personas; customers & stakeholders across Tesco technology team and their pain points.
 * Accountable for the performance/adoption of the product and work towards achieving the Outcomes and Key Results (OKRs)
 * Prioritise work and decisively resolve trade-offs with peers and senior leaders
 * Liaise with the program management team for business initiatives to plan dependencies thereby effectively prioritising xAPI deliverables.
 * Analyse & evaluate business requirements by liaising with the business team.
 * Translate and derive xAPI product requirements from business requirements by participating in broader solution conversations with other product teams within Tesco (using for example user stories with acceptance criteria; functional and non-functional requirements).
 * Steer planning sessions by working with the engineering counterparts to plan the work that will deliver maximum business value in least effort
 * Drive the acceptance and adoption of ideas and improvements with product teams and engineering stakeholders
 * Prioritise coordinate and communicate the resolution of live product issues independently
 * Provide leadership and direction to team on short-term tasks/near-term priorities
 * Be the subject matter expert and point of contact for the xAPI team
   
   

Key people and teams you work within and outside of Tesco


 * Members of your Product team
 * xAPI Engineering Team
 * Front-end and back-end Product Teams
 * Colleagues and technical stakeholders across Tesco Technology
 * Senior Management; and Product and Technology Directors
   
   

Skills relevant for the job


 * Experience as a PaaS or SaaS Product Manager
 * Experience in managing API-based products and services on public and private cloud.
 * Knowledge and understanding of API standards like REST; GraphQL and API data interchange formats like JSON; XML etc.
 * Prior technical background and experience in software development.
 * Understanding of APIs and the art of the possible
 * Understanding of User Research/ Design Thinking concepts
 * Knowledge of Agile methodologies; writing effective user stories/ acceptance criterions
 * Excellent facilitation to effectively facilitate requirement gathering/elicitation sessions with senior business leaders/stakeholders
 * Strong decision making and prioritization skills; especially when multiple trade-offs are involved; and faster decision are required
 * Empathy and good listening skills to understand the needs/ pain points of your customers/stakeholders
 * A methodical/ analytical approach and great problem-solving skills
 * Attitude and the aptitude to learn new product area/domain quickly
 * Great presentation and persuasion skills
 * Team player who could work collaboratively with other members of the team
 * Great people skills and can gain respect and trust of team members and others working with you
 * Ownership; responsiveness; and commitment towards assigned work
 * Highly numerate and comfortable working with data
 * Excellent written and verbal communication skills
   
   

Qualifications

Product Manager – xAPI

Additional Information

Important Notice:

On behalf of Tesco Bengaluru, we must caution all job seekers and educational institutions that Tesco Bengaluru does not authorise any third parties to release employment offers or conduct recruitment drives via a third party. Hence, beware of inauthentic and fraudulent job offers or recruitment drives from any individuals or websites purporting to represent Tesco. Further, Tesco Bengaluru does not charge any fee or other emoluments for any reason (including without limitation, visa fees) or seek compensation from educational institutions to participate in recruitment events.

Accordingly, please check the authenticity of any such offers before acting on them and where acted upon, you do so at your own risk. Tesco Bengaluru shall neither be responsible for honouring or making good the promises made by fraudulent third parties, nor for any monetary or any other loss incurred by the aggrieved individual or educational institution.

In the event that you come across any fraudulent activities in the name of Tesco Bengaluru, please feel free report the incident at recruitment_compliance_india@tesco.com

Job Description

Product managers at TESCO Technology are passionate about solving problems. They take accountability for complex and company strategic products; and are empowered to drive the product strategy; the roadmap and the outcomes. Driven by curiosity and innovation; coupled with strong partnership with Business; Engineering and Data Science teams; our product managers create value for our Customers and Colleagues globally.

Product Manager for Oracle Fusion Finance Modules:


 * Implementation experience of Fusion Finance with 10 – 12 years of work experience.
 * Must be well versed with GL; AP; AR and Tax.
 * Must have managed Oracle quarterly release cycle and should be able to handle impact assessments; prioritization; stakeholder communication and delivery of the new features across all the Fusion modules.

 * Should have created technology roadmaps and strategies.

Product Manager for Oracle Fusion capabilities
