title: Associate - Copywriter
description:
At EY, you’ll have the chance to build a career as unique as you are, with the global scale, support, inclusive culture and technology to become the best version of you. And we’re counting on your unique voice and perspective to help EY become even better, too. Join us and build an exceptional experience for yourself, and a better working world for all.

The opportunity

EY GDS Content Center of Excellence is a fast-growing team of talented copywriters, editors, content strategists, thought leadership writers, technical writers and editorial managers. People in the team provide support for key global EY publications and campaigns.

We are looking for candidates with exceptional copywriting and storytelling skills and significant experience working on copywriting projects for a range of platforms and audiences. As team player in a multi-disciplinary team, you will create engaging and inspiring content and demonstrate aptitude for visualization and art direction.

Your Key Responsibilities


 * Create external and internal B2B content, including newsletters, mailers, EY news articles, videos, posters, flyers, and brochures
 * Edit content to ensure quality, consistency and alignment with EY’s purpose and editorial strategy
 * Repurpose content to meet the needs of the readership
 * Provide copywriting support for high-visibility EY programs and campaigns
 * Suggest improvements to the tone and structure of the content
 * Liaise with stakeholders and design teams to ensure seamless execution and delivery of projects
 * Ensure the content is compliant with EY legal guidelines
 * Collaborate with design teams to ensure that content and design complement each other
 * Ensure that customers receive the highest quality deliverables
 * Manage multiple creative projects
   
   

Skills And Attributes For Success


 * Adept in creating engaging, inspiring and persuasive B2B content
 * Ability to understand and articulate complex business ideas in an engaging, audience-friendly style
 * Ability to tell stories that inspire action
 * Excellent interpersonal and written communication skills
 * Deft in writing, editing and has a way with words
 * Ability to think visually and blend copy and creative to create impactful, cohesive outputs
 * Excellent interpersonal and written communication skills
 * Exceptional attention to detail
   
   

To qualify for the role, you must have


 * Bachelor’s or master’s degree, preferably in English literature or mass communication
 * At least 1-3 years of relevant experience
   
   

Ideally, you’ll also have


 * Publishing house or Big Four experience
 * Aptitude and willingness to continually expand your core skillset
   
   

Technologies and tools


 * Proficiency in MS Office Suite (Word/PowerPoint)
 * Knowledge in Project Management tools and methods
   
   

What We Look For


 * Love writing and have a way with words
 * Are good at writing about topics EY writes about
 * Are already aware of what EY is and what we do
 * Can create content that aligns with an organization's purpose and editorial strategy
 * Have created content for ads, brochures, magazines, flyers, websites, videos, blogs and social media
 * Have written for people of different age groups, in different occupations and at different levels in the organizational hierarchy
 * Have worked with global clients
 * Are comfortable writing about complex business ideas and concepts
 * Have written for C-suites and boards
 * Understand complex business concepts with ease
 * Are outstanding at grammar, usage and convention
   
   

What We Offer

EY Global Delivery Services (GDS) is a dynamic and truly global delivery network. We work across six locations – Argentina, China, India, the Philippines, Poland and the UK – and with teams from all EY service lines, geographies and sectors, playing a vital role in the delivery of the EY growth strategy. From accountants to coders to advisory consultants, we offer a wide variety of fulfilling career opportunities that span all business disciplines. In GDS, you will collaborate with EY teams on exciting projects and work with well-known brands from across the globe. We’ll introduce you to an ever-expanding ecosystem of people, learning, skills and insights that will stay with you throughout your career.


 * Continuous learning: You’ll develop the mindset and skills to navigate whatever comes next.
 * Success, as defined by you: We’ll provide the tools and flexibility, so you can make a meaningful impact, your way.
 * Transformative leadership: We’ll give you the insights, coaching and confidence to be the leader the world needs.
 * Diverse and inclusive culture: You’ll be embraced for who you are and empowered to use your voice to help others find theirs.
   
   

EY | Building a better working world

EY exists to build a better working world, helping to create long-term value for clients, people and society and build trust in the capital markets.

Enabled by data and technology, diverse EY teams in over 150 countries provide trust through assurance and help clients grow, transform and operate.

Working across assurance, consulting, law, strategy, tax and transactions, EY teams ask better questions to find new answers for the complex issues facing our world today.

title: Associate Manager - Copywriter
description:
About Navi




Navi is one of the fastest growing financial services companies in India providing Personal & Home Loans, Insurance and Mutual Funds with a digital first approach. At Navi, our mission is to build financial services that are simple, accessible and affordable.




Founders: Sachin Bansal & Ankit Agarwal




Know what makes you a “Navi_ite” :

1.Perseverance, Passion and Commitment

• Passionate about Navi’s mission and vision

• Demonstrates dedication, perseverance and high ownership

• Goes above and beyond by taking on additional responsibilities




2.Obsession with high quality results

• Consistently creates value for the customers and stakeholders through high quality outcomes

• Ensuring excellence in all aspects of work

• Efficiently manages time, prioritizes tasks, and achieves higher standards




3.Resilience and Adaptability

• Adapts quickly to new roles, responsibilities, and changing circumstances, showing resilience and agility




Key Responsibilities




 * Interpretive Excellence: Thoroughly understand copywriting briefs to accurately grasp project requirements. Craft, edit, and meticulously proofread captivating content that captures attention, all while maintaining a distinctive voice.
 * Strategic Collaboration: Engage effectively with a diverse array of internal and external stakeholders. Transform intricate insights into straightforward and captivating communication that resonates. All of this is accomplished within specified timeframes.
 * Content Planning: Develop a comprehensive content calendar designed for seamless implementation across various channels. Ensure strategic alignment and efficient utilization of resources.
 * Deliverables Management: Successfully create and deliver promotional and seasonal assets, catering to multiple verticals. These assets should effectively communicate our message and values.
 * Insight Integration: Utilize consumer insights and glean knowledge from customer pain points. This approach will help enhance digital Customer Experience (CX) across our app and website, contributing to iterative improvements.
 * Consistency Advocate: Uphold a consistent experience across all published content. Maintain uniformity not only in tone of voice but also from a visual standpoint.
 * Data-Driven Insights: Employ data from diverse channels to identify key engagement points and extract valuable insights. These insights will guide strategic decisions and content optimizations.
 * Agency Collaboration: Partner seamlessly with external agencies to guarantee timely deliverables of content and creatives. Effective collaboration will ensure the alignment of our vision and objectives.




Requirements:




 * Proven experience as a copywriter or related role.
 * Excellent written and verbal communication abilities.
 * Use consumer insights to drive home the intended-communication succinctly.
 * Strong interpersonal, management and stakeholder-handling skills with bias to action.
 * Strong project reporting/management skills.
 * Strong analytical mindset.
 * Hands-on experience in content marketing.
 * Highly creative with a strong collaborative spirit.
 * Experience of building customer-focused content




Qualification:




 * 4+ years of copywriting experience in consumer focused businesses, content agencies or similar roles.
 * Experience in building financial content desirable, not mandatory.
 * Graduate or postgraduate in any discipline.

title: Assistant Manager - Copywriter
description:
Company Overview

SUGAR Cosmetics (www.sugarcosmetics.com) is India’s fastest-growing premium cosmetics brand with a product portfolio that has consistently received excellent reviews across its own and partner channels. With a cult-following across millennials, SUGAR targets 25 to 35-year-old women with clutter-breaking products that have rich payoff with its unapologetically bold brand identity. The 7-year old company recently secured its Series B funding from marquee investors A91 Partners, IndiaQuotient, etc. to further accelerate and build an exciting global beauty brand. We are now looking for ambitious, driven individuals to join us on this journey and create experiences of a lifetime and our team.

Website: www.sugarcosmetics.com

Position: Assistant Manager - Copywriter

Working Days: Monday to Friday

Location: WeWork Chromium, Jogeshwari - Vikhroli Link Rd, Andheri East, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400076

Company News: Sugar Cosmetics raises $50 million led by L Catterton

Role Expectations


 * Create engaging and persuasive copy for various copy materials, including print ads, digital ads, social media campaigns, website content, video scripts, and more
 * Ensure the copy is concise, compelling, and aligned with the brand's tone and voice
 * Craft trending, insights-based blog writing in the form of long-form articles for skincare and makeup topics
 * Collaborate with the marketing and brand team to develop content strategies that drive engagement, traffic, and conversions. Contribute innovative ideas to enhance content quality and effectiveness
 * Conduct thorough research on industry-related topics to ensure accuracy and credibility of information presented in content
 * Use SEO guidelines to write product descriptions and trending articles to increase website traffic
 * Stay abreast of latest beauty trends and best content writing practices to incorporate them into content strategies and enhance the brand's digital presence
 * Maintain impeccable grammar, language proficiency, and attention to detail in all written communications and editorial oversight
 * Monitor project milestones, deadlines, and dependencies, taking proactive measures to address any deviations from the original plan and communicating updates to relevant stakeholder
   
   

Role Specifications


 * Bachelor's degree in Journalism, Communications, Marketing, or a related field. A relevant master's degree is a plus
 * Exceptional Writing Skills: Strong command of the English language with excellent grammar, spelling, and punctuation. Ability to write in a clear, concise, and engaging manner
 * Familiarity with SEO best practices and the ability to optimize content for search engines
 * Proficient in conducting thorough research and fact-checking to ensure accuracy and reliability of content
 * Ability to generate original ideas and adapt writing style to fit different platforms and target audiences
 * Proficiency in crafting content for various digital mediums, including email, SMS, WhatsApp, app notifications, web banners, and SEM copies
 * Excellent organizational skills and the ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously, meeting deadlines without compromising quality
 * Strong interpersonal skills and the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams
 * Familiarity with content management systems (CMS), social media platforms, and other digital marketing tools
 * A portfolio of writing samples that demonstrates your ability to create compelling and engaging content across various platforms

title: Content Writer
description:
We are a Pune based startup, just firing up our engines!




After one year of hard work, we are set to transform the baby food industry by creating the most delicious, nutritious, and safe baby food out there. We make ready-to-feed pureed meals that are nutrient dense, clean label and made from 100% natural & whole ingredients for babies over seven months old.




We are financially backed and have great ambitions. We want to show the world that you can build a successful business that cares about more than just profit. That means looking after people and the planet as much as we look after our bottom line, and leaving things better than we find them. 

 

To head in the right direction, we need to associate with curious, creative people with brilliant fresh ideas. 

 

We are looking for someone who is passionate about Content Writing, Copywriting, Storytelling, Community Building and Social Media. Someone who eats, sleeps and breathes content. That person will be a part of the core founding team and work with the founders since day 1 as Head of Marketing Communication / Marketing Communication Specialist. She/he will take care of the entire brand communication, strategy, content writing, and social media. 

 

Who we want:

Humans

Humility, respect, and empathy matter. Always be willing to learn from each other and remember that when you empower the people around you, we all win

 

Game Raisers

We want people who see opportunities all around them. The ones who roll up their sleeves, get stuck in, and won’t stop until they get an answer.

 

Simplifiers

People who are comfortable working through confusing situations, and can get creative to come up with great solutions

 

Team Players

We are after people who are great at building relationships across the business. People who are generous with feedback and will contribute to our wider culture

 

All Rounders

We need people who play their part in getting us to where we want to be. Ultimately, we want people who can deliver a great result for us. 

 

Fanatics

About babies, toddlers, kids. About customers, exceeding expectations. About the environment.

 

Our values are a big part of what makes us, us. We make sure we live by each and every one. We use them in our big meetings, small meetings and chats over coffee. 

 

What will you get?

Whatever your reasons are to come onboard , we can promise you a warm welcome, a chance to build a company with the founders, a seat at the table as a core member, transition into leadership roles, good days and bad days, employee stock options, and employee #1 tag (Literally, as you are going to be our first hire)

 

We would love to talk to you over coffee (physically or virtually). Do let us know. 




P.S. Apply only if you are an avid writer/storyteller, if you write Blogs/LinkedIn Posts/ Articles regularly. We are actively looking for someone who is outgoing and an extrovert, who have a keen eye for detail. This is a full time job at our Pune office in an on-site setting.

title: Content Writer - Blogs
description:
Job Overview

Admattic is on the lookout for a talented Content Writer to join our team, specializing in crafting engaging and informative blogs. As a Content Writer focused on Admattic Blogs, you will play a pivotal role in conveying our brand narrative and industry expertise. The ideal candidate will possess a passion for digital advertising, a keen understanding of our publisher-driven brand, and the ability to create compelling content that resonates with our global audience.

Responsibilities


 * Blog Creation:
 * Generate well-researched, insightful, and engaging blog content that aligns with Admattic's brand identity and messaging.
 * Develop content that highlights Admattic's unique position as a publisher-driven, brand-safe advertising solution without compromising on scale, performance, or creative excellence.
 * Brand Storytelling:
 * Craft compelling narratives that effectively communicate Admattic's value proposition, emphasizing our commitment to curated premium properties, brand safety, and proprietary ad experiences.
 * Translate complex technological concepts into accessible, reader-friendly content.
 * Collaboration and Research:
 * Collaborate with internal teams, including marketing and technology, to gather insights and information for blog topics.
 * Stay abreast of industry trends, innovations, and news related to digital advertising and technology.
 * SEO Optimization:
 * Implement SEO best practices to optimize blog content for search engines and increase organic visibility.
 * Research and incorporate relevant keywords to enhance content discoverability.
 * Editorial Excellence:
 * Ensure all blog content meets high editorial standards for clarity, accuracy, and adherence to brand guidelines.
 * Edit and proofread content, incorporating feedback for continuous improvement.
   
   

Qualifications


 * Bachelor’s degree in English, Journalism, Marketing, or a related field.
 * 2-3 years of experience in content writing, specifically for blogs or editorial content.
 * Exceptional writing skills with a portfolio showcasing relevant blog samples.
   
   

Preferred Skills


 * Understanding of digital advertising, ad technology, and industry-specific terminology.
 * Familiarity with SEO tools and practices.
 * Ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.

title: Content Writer
description:
Company Description


Haldiram Foods International Ltd, founded in 1937 by Ganga Bishan Agarwal (Haldiram Ji), is a family-owned business dedicated to delivering the most authentic taste of India through its products. The company has expanded to include multiple product lines, retail stores across India, and markets overseas. Despite its growth, Haldiram's remains committed to tradition, quality, and simplicity, using only natural ingredients and maintaining a homemade feel to its products. The company is an integral part of every Indian household and prides itself on creating a strong sense of community and supporting its associates.

This is a full-time on-site role for a Content Writer located in Nagpur. The Content Writer will be responsible for researching, writing, proofreading, and creating content strategies. The Content Writer will be responsible for developing web content and ensuring that the content is engaging, informative, and reflects the company's brand and values.

title: Content Writer
description:
Responsibilities

title: Editor (Content Writer) - Mumbai
description:
At Nielsen, we believe that career growth is a partnership. You ultimately own, fuel and set the journey. By joining our team of nearly 14,000 associates, you will become part of a community that will help you to succeed. We champion you because when you succeed, we do too. Embark on a new initiative, explore a fresh approach, and take license to think big, so we can all continuously improve. We enable your best to power our future.

Gracenote is the top provider of entertainment information, creating industry-leading databases of TV, movie, and music metadata for entertainment guides, applications and in car entertainment. We are the leading supplier of TV and Movie entertainment data. We supply data to leading entertainment platforms and devices.

We are presently looking for an Enrichment Editor ROLE The Editor will be expected to research, gather and process TV series and movies from studios, distributors, websites and related sources in a timely and accurate manner for entry into an internal database. Communication with broadcasters, content providers and other internal teams will be expected in order to secure all necessary editorial requirements. The successful candidate will work in a relaxed office environment and independently manage the given workload and projects.

RESPONSIBILITIES:


 * Create, curate and enhance metadata: both for currently airing TV programs, and maintaining a permanent library of TV program data.
 * Investigate, confirm and document information for TV and movies assets
 * Consolidate and gap populate data content and new program information in editorial databases.
 * Maintain accurate database information ensuring all output conforms to strict broadcast quality standards, editorial policies and client service level agreements.
 * Work to tight deadlines to ensure our clients receive high quality data
   
   

SKILLS & EXPERIENCE:


 * Passionate about TV and movies and the latest programs. An interest in sports is also essential
 * Bachelor’s Degree or equivalent work experience in Communications or Journalism
 * Excellent command over the English language, experience working to an editorial style guide and impeccable written and verbal skills.
 * Experience using content management systems
 * Ability to work independently with excellent project and time management skills
 * Strong communication skills, ability to adjust to rapidly shifting deadlines while remaining detail-oriented.
 * Ready to work in a 24/7 operation, including evening, night and weekend shifts.
 * The role is hybrid, so you must live near Nielsen’s office. Hybrid Workers are those employees who are working partially from home which is in the same city as the Nielsen office they are employed with and partially from a Nielsen office / site
   
   

About The Team

Gracenote, a Nielsen company, provides music, video, and sports content along with technologies to the world's hottest entertainment products and brands, which is also a global standard for music and video recognition which is supported by the largest source of entertainment data. Gracenote features descriptions of more than 200 million tracks, TV listings for 85+ countries, and statistics from 4,500 sports leagues and competitions.

About Nielsen

By connecting clients to audiences, we fuel the media industry with the most accurate understanding of what people listen to and watch. To discover what audiences love, we measure across all channels and platforms—from podcasts to streaming TV to social media. And when companies and advertisers are truly connected to their audiences, they can see the most important opportunities and accelerate growth. Do you want to move the industry forward with Nielsen? Our people are the driving force. Your thoughts, ideas, and expertise can propel us forward. Whether you have fresh thinking around maximizing a new technology or you see a gap in the market, we are here to listen and act. Our team is made strong by a diversity of thoughts, experiences, skills, and backgrounds. You’ll enjoy working with smart, fun, curious colleagues, who are passionate about their work. Come be part of a team that motivates you to do your best work!

title: Content Writer/Executive Administration H&S
description:
At Arcadis we focus on attracting, retaining and developing people who share our passion and commitment to improve quality of life. In return we offer you the opportunity to transform your world and the world around you, that could be through client work, upskilling yourself, championing equality and inclusion or getting involved in charity work, to name just a few. Our people value different perspectives, they care about the sustainability of our planet and dare to shape the future.

One of our core values is ‘people first’, and supported by our Lovinklaan foundation, we invest in you for the long term, to ensure you reach your full potential. You’ll have the opportunity to own your career and work on industry-defining projects, finding solutions to real challenges that make a difference to people’s lives. You’re encouraged to have a growth mindset and are given the space to develop personally and professionally, building a flexible career that works for you.




We are seeking a highly organized and detail-oriented Admin support executive and content writer with experience to provide comprehensive support to our executive team while ensuring the well-being and safety of our workplace. This role requires a proactive individual with excellent communication skills and strong administrative abilities.



Responsibilities:



1. Admin support

 * Provide high-level administrative support to executives, including calendar management, travel arrangements, and correspondence.
 * Maintaining expense reports, raising POs for project related costs
 * Production and formatting of documentation / reports / bids / Newsletters / internal documents and presentations as needed.
 * Respond to and resolve enquiries and problems, judging when to pass complex queries on to or involve others
 * Liaise with and build strong working relationships with colleagues across the wider business
 * Adhoc Tasks as and when assigned

2.Supporting the H&S team in Australia

 * Build effective relationships with senior leaders and project managers.
 * Collaborate with stakeholders to define, track, and finalize actions and improvement initiatives.
 * Document and distribute communications via digital forums.
 * Proactively schedule and track training and wellbeing events.
 * Develop communications, presentations, and documentation for the function.
 * Facilitate WHS Committee meetings, including coordination, minutes, and liaison with committee members.
 * Enhance and update WHS systems and SharePoint for accurate reflection of Risk control standards.




Qualifications:

 * Content writing experience will be preferred.
 * Strong interpersonal and communication skills.
 * Knowledge of ISO 9001 quality systems standard is preferred
 * Highly proficient in all Microsoft programs including MS Word, PowerPoint, Excel, Outlook and Adobe Acrobat
 * Strong analytical and communication skills.







Why Become an Arcadian?

Our work with clients has a direct impact on people’s lives and on the planet. We make moving, living and belonging in cities safer, more resilient and more sustainable. By partnering with our clients as responsible custodians of our earth's resources, we can create a sustainable planet.

We continue to think of new ways to make positive impacts and create better experiences for people; data driven and digital solutions have become part of the Arcadis DNA. Working together with clients and using techniques like design thinking, we can get to the heart of our clients’ most pressing challenges and work together to solve them.

As a global business, we have committed to support five of the UN’s Sustainable Development Goals to ensure that our projects contribute to a better and more sustainable future for all. But it’s not just the work that we do on client projects that benefits communities and our planet. As a global business, we are committed to making a positive impact to society by supporting local communities where we operate.

To help protect our planet, we monitor and measure non-financial information to inform business decisions and reduce our own environmental impact as part of our commitment to be net zero carbon as a global company by 2030.

Our Commitment to Equality, Diversity, Inclusion & Belonging

We want you to be able to bring your best self to work every day, which is why we take equality and inclusion seriously and hold ourselves to account for our actions. Our ambition is to be an employer of choice and provide a great place to work for all our people. At Arcadis, you will have the opportunity to build the career that is right for you. Because each Arcadian has their own motivations, their own career goals. And, as a ‘people ﬁrst’ business, it is why we will take the time to listen, to understand what you want from your time here, and provide the support you need to achieve your ambitions.

Transform Your World
sector: Construction, Civil Engineering, and Design Services

title: Copywriter
description:
WE DON'T WANT PEOPLE TO WORK FOR US




Let us put it this way; we want people to work with us.

Because when you think of it, there's a big difference. At LIQVD ASIA, we believe more in partners than employees. Our team is right now brimming with ideators, innovators, geek, marketers and human experience strategists. Think you can fit right in? Apply to this job post with your CV. Rest assured, if you are that good, we will make space for you.



Location: Mumbai




Your Role as Copywriter:




We are searching for a Copywriter who can create original content and edit existing content to be used over multiple platforms including Web site, blogs, emails and formats, including writing whitepapers, case studies, info graphics, smart charts, newsletters and emails to meet business objectives. You may also need to create and implement various marketing campaigns to achieve specific marketing goals through online, off-line and social platforms. Compile and summarize researched information, data and statistics into reports.




What the role demands:

 * Ability of storytelling in short formats in a compelling manner.
 * Understanding and delivering communication objectives through the audio-visual medium.
 * Sticking to steep deadlines.
 * Resilience to work through big-picture changes.
 * Ardent content buff and glued in on social media trends.
 * Fierce attention to technical details and aesthetics.
 * Collaborative spirit to work seamlessly with various stakeholders.




Requirements

What to bring:

 * Strong communication skills: English, Hinglish.
 * Proven expertise and track record in content ideation and execution.
 * Excellent Problem solving and decision-making skills.
 * Loads of enthusiasm and energy.




Additional Information




What's in it for you?

· Great salary and secure working environment

· Becoming an integral part of a cutting-edge agency and helping it grow

· Working with an international, talented and dedicated group

· Casual atmosphere with professional standards

· Creative, modern and spacious work environment




We are LIQVD ASIA.



At LIQVD ASIA, we have professionals in marketing, creative and technology functions that connect trends with brands and brands with people. Also, we boast of a value system and culture that’s forward-thinking, respectful, collaborative, high-energy, fun, with zero tolerance for sub-standard ideas. We are clear about one thing. We deliver success not because of what we do, but because of who we are. And we don’t need any clear drink to tell you that.



About LIQVD ASIA




Established in 2013, LIQVD ASIA is a digital marketing agency that is growing at a rapid 400% pace & has its relationships with a diverse national & global clientele. Our agency has an exceptional reputation for creating award-winning digital content experiences that foster trust with target audiences. LIQVD ASIA is comprised of marketing, creative and technology professionals dedicated to connecting brands with people. Our vision and values are to provide people with a professional and supportive environment where employees contribute, grow and flourish. Our culture is forward-thinking, respectful, collaborative, and fun.

title: Staff Copywriter
description:
At EY, you’ll have the chance to build a career as unique as you are, with the global scale, support, inclusive culture and technology to become the best version of you. And we’re counting on your unique voice and perspective to help EY become even better, too. Join us and build an exceptional experience for yourself, and a better working world for all.

Job Title: Copy Writer

Position Summary: As a Copywriter with exper.se in life sciences, you will play a crucial role in developing compelling and scientifically accurate content that communicates complex concepts in a clear and engaging manner for our clients. Working closely with our client’s marke.ng and medical teams, you will create content for a variety of digital platforms to effectively convey the value and impact of their products and services for various campaigns and across various channels.

Responsibilities:


 * Content Creation:
    * Develop clear and concise copy for a range of marke.ng materials across digitalchannels, including IVAs, websites, banners, emails, and social media platforms.
    * Translate technical and scientific information into accessible and compelling content for a diverse audience.
      
      

 * Collaboration:
    * Work closely with the marke.ng team, medical team, and subject matter experts to gather information and ensure accuracy in messaging.
    * Collaborate with designers to integrate copy and visuals seamlessly for impactful communication.
      
      

 * Brand Voice and Consistency:
    * Maintain and uphold the company's brand voice, ensuring consistency across all communication channels.
      
      

 * Editing and Proofreading:
    * Edit and proofread content to ensure accuracy, grammar, and adherence to style guidelines.
    * Collaborate with team members to review and improve each other's work.
      
      

 * Compliance:
    * Ensure that all copy complies with relevant industry regulations and standards, including those related to life sciences promotional marke.ng.
      

Qualifications:


 * Bachelor's degree in a relevant field (e.g., Life Sciences, Biology, Biochemistry, Biotechnology, or related discipline).
 * Proven experience of 1-3 yrs as a copywriter, preferably within the life sciences or healthcare industry.
 * Exceptional written and verbal communication skills.
 * Strong attention to detail and the ability to distill complex information into clear, engaging content.
 * Familiarity with industry regulations and guidelines governing life sciences marke.ng.
 * Proficiency in using content creation tools and platforms.
   
   

Preferred Skills:


 * Understanding of SEO principles and best practices.
 * Ability to work in a collabora.ve team environment.
 * Familiarity with design or content authoring software.
 * Strong time management skills and ability to meet deadlines.
   
   

EY | Building a better working world

EY exists to build a better working world, helping to create long-term value for clients, people and society and build trust in the capital markets.

Enabled by data and technology, diverse EY teams in over 150 countries provide trust through assurance and help clients grow, transform and operate.

Working across assurance, consulting, law, strategy, tax and transactions, EY teams ask better questions to find new answers for the complex issues facing our world today.

Join us in making quality content accessible to businesses worldwide while fostering the growth of our freelance writer community.

title: Business content writers/desk professionals
description:
The Upstox Story:

Upstox is one of India's leading Fin-Tech companies with a mission to simplify trading & investing to make it easily accessible to the masses. We aim to enable everyone, from new investors to seasoned traders, to invest across multiple categories with our state-of-the-art trade & investment platform and commission-free pricing. We offer numerous asset categories to invest in, like Stocks, IPOs, Mutual Funds, and more.

By focusing on our customers’ needs and equipping them with personalized yet powerful tools, we witnessed a steep growth of 800% in our customer base from 25 Thousand in 2017 to 2 Lakh in 2019. With 1500% growth in 2020, currently, over 10 million customers trust us with their investment decisions, thus setting us on the course to become an industry-leader in the country. Our mission is simple - to break down the complexities of investing and make it more effortless, accessible, affordable, and easy for the masses to adopt. This key principle when infused with intuitive design and leading-edge technology will help us empower every Indian to take control of their investments.

RKSV Securities was founded by Ravi Kumar and Shrinivas Viswanath in 2009 and was soon graced by Kavitha Subramanian as the third co-founder in 2016. Backed by Ratan Tata, Upstox had raised $4 million in Series A funding in early 2016 that was led by Kalaari Capital. The Series B funding round scaled multifold and witnessed an investment of $25 million by US-based investment firm - Tiger Global Management in September 2019.

As a business content writer/desk professional, you will be responsible for creating high-quality, and informative content related to financial markets and personal finance. Your role will involve research, writing, and editing content for our website and other communication channels. Ability to work in a fast-paced newsroom environment will be given preference. Knowledge of SEO will be an added advantage. Previous experience of working in digital publications, research houses, brokerages etc will be preferred.

Responsibilities:

Produce well-researched, accurate, and engaging content on topics related to stock market/personal finance

Stay updated on market trends, economic events and personal finance developments and write articles that helps our audience understand and navigate these developments

Implement SEO best practices to improve the visibility of our content and drive organic traffic

Churn out articles on immediate basis based on market developments

Review and edit content for clarity, grammar, and adherence to our style guidelines

Psst… tips on how you can beat the competition:

 * Be self-driven / quick starter
 * Have an ownership mindset
 * Aggressively drive and deliver results
   
   
   

A basic requirement but one that many forget: Make sure you go through our website, download our app and give us feedback!

title: Content Writer
description:
ABOUT US




Livspace is Asiaʼs largest and fastest-growing omnichannel home interiors and renovation platform. Using its proprietary technology, Livspace provides a one-stop renovation solution for homeowners—from design to managed last mile fulfillment for all rooms in a home. The platform has organized a fragmented industry, bringing together designers, brands, manufacturers, and contractors to enable an eCommerce-like trusted, and predictable experience.




The company launched operations in Bengaluru, India in 2015. Since its inception, Livspace has organized a fragmented industry, bringing together a curated community of designers, brands, manufacturers and contractors. This has resulted in an e-commercelike trusted and predictable experience for the homeowners. Livspace boasts of a community of 50000+ satisfied customers and over 2000 interior designers.




The company is already the largest employer of interior designers in the country. Livspace currently serves Singapore, Malaysia, Saudi Arabia as well as 30 metro and non-metro areas in India including - Bengaluru, Chennai, Delhi, Noida, Gurgaon, Mumbai, Thane, Pune, Hyderabad, Kolkata, Ahmedabad, Kochi, Jaipur, Lucknow, Indore, Surat, Coimbatore, Mysore, Mangalore, Vizag, Vijayawada.




Livspace has showcased phenomenal growth since its launch, having delivered over 125,000 rooms and selling over 7.5 million SKUs through its platform. The company also delivered 50,000 homes across all our serviceable locations. The founders - Anuj Srivastava and Ramakant Sharma are former Google and Myntra executives respectively, who are seasoned entrepreneurs and successful angel investors. Livspaceʼs leadership team combines world-class talent and entrepreneurial experience gathered at some of the best companies in the world.




Livspace has raised around USD 450 million in capital from some of the top global investors including KKR, Ingka Group Investments (part of largest IKEA retailer Ingka Group), TPG Growth, Goldman Sachs, Kharis Capital, Venturi Partners, FFP (Peugeot Groupʼs Holding Company), EDBI, Bessemer Venture Partners, Jungle Ventures, Helion Ventures and UC-RNT. For more information, please visit: https://www.livspace.com/




Digital content writing, the ability to do primary and secondary research, adherence to SEO practices and brand-related guidelines are key to this role. We are looking for individuals who are creative, grammatically sound, quick learners and have the ability to deliver within tight deadlines.




Key Responsibilities

 * Ideating for industry and category-relevant topics
 * Writing engaging and SEO-optimised content for the blog. The writer should have the ability to adapt their writing style according to different geographies and channels
 * Creating metadata (SEO titles, descriptions and image alt text) as per SEO guidelines
 * Undertaking primary research (speaking to designers, partner brands, homeowners etc.) and secondary research
 * Contributing to ad hoc writing and website updation tasks as needed
 * Creating the Social Media Calendar in collaboration with the Managing Editor and Social Media team
 * Crafting the Newsletter for the Magazine in collaboration with the Design Team
 * Shortlisting appropriate graphics for the blog from internal and external databases




External Skills And Expertise




 * A bachelor’s in English, Journalism or similar fields
 * Language enthusiast with a keen eye for grammar and usage
 * 1-2 years experience in writing digital content
 * Hands on experience with SEO is preferred
 * A basic understanding of publishing tools such as WordPress or an alternate CMS
 * Elementary knowledge of the home interiors landscape is preferred

title: Features Writer, Vogue
description:
The foundation of Vogue’s leadership and authority is the brand’s unique role as a cultural barometer for a global audience. Vogue places fashion in the context of culture and the world we live in — how we dress, live and socialize; what we eat, listen to and watch; who leads and inspires us. Vogue immerses itself in fashion, always leading readers to what will happen next. Thought-provoking, relevant and always influential, Vogue defines the culture of fashion.

Job Description

Location:

Mumbai, MH

Position Summary & Scope:

As a features writer at Vogue India, you will play a vital role in producing engaging, curated and well-written fashion and culture features for the website. Working closely with the fashion and features editors, you will contribute to the creation of captivating stories that align with Vogue's brand identity and cater to the Indian and global markets.

Experience:

2-4 years

Areas of Responsibility (Key Result Areas):

Trend spotting - Keep abreast of all fashion and pop culture news and tailor features to respond accordingly. Remember, before it's in fashion, it's in Vogue, so in-depth knowledge about fashion is a prerequisite.

Producing quality features - Produce well-researched, engaging and original features, interviews and opinion pieces that align with Vogue India's style, tone and editorial guidelines. It is crucial to have an ear to the ground at all times so you're able to present one-of-a-kind stories that haven't been told before.

Fact Checking - Verify the accuracy, credibility and authenticity of information and sources used in the features articles.

Adhering to deadlines and quick turnaround - In the fast-paced universe of Condé Nast, content is king but timing is queen. As part of the leading fashion publication in the world, you will need to ensure that feature targets for fashion and culture pieces are always met.

Collaboration - Collaborate with Photographers, Stylists, Writers and other creatives to bring a new perspective to fashion and culture content.

Liaising with contributing writers - This involves writing to and compiling pitches from Vogue India's fashion and feature contributors and running them by the respective section editors to create a monthly calendar.

Networking - Attend fashion shows, events, and industry gatherings to build relationships with key stakeholders, gather industry insights, and source potential feature opportunities.

Ideating for social media - One of the key responsibilities of your job is to ideate on how to tell stories for social media. Social is a constantly evolving behemoth and with the proliferation of apps, it is crucial for you to have a sound understanding of the landscape in order to adapt content for each platform.

Ideating for video content - Vogue has seen great results in its thrust towards video content and our video strategy is something we will continue to refine and solidify over the course of the next few months. As a features writer, you will play an integral part in shaping Vogue India's video future.

Reporting To:

Features Editor and Senior Features Editor

What happens next?

If you are interested in this opportunity, please apply below, and we will review your application as soon as possible. You can update your resume or upload a cover letter at any time by accessing your candidate profile.

Condé Nast is an equal opportunity employer. We evaluate qualified applicants without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, veteran status, age, familial status and other legally protected characteristics.

title: Copywriter
description:
About the Role:




Aftershoot is a leading AI-powered photo culling and editing software company with over 100,000 users and tens of thousands of customers. We are looking for a Copywriter to join our dynamic marketing team. In this role, you'll play a pivotal role in crafting compelling and engaging copy for emails, ads, social media, and landing pages. We're looking for someone with a keen creative flair, possessing the ability to navigate between being smart and witty, and keeping things refreshingly simple when needed.




Qualifications:




 * Proven experience as a Copywriter with a focus on crafting compelling content for emails, ads, social media, and landing pages.
 * Exceptional creativity and a knack for generating fresh ideas that resonate with our target audience.
 * Strong understanding of the nuances between being smart and witty versus adopting a straightforward, clear communication style.
 * Proficiency in tailoring messaging to align with brand voice and objectives.
 * Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
 * Ability to work collaboratively with cross-functional teams and absorb feedback to refine copy.




Responsibilities:




 * Develop engaging and effective copy for a variety of channels, including emails, ads, social media, and landing pages.
 * Collaborate closely with the marketing team to understand campaign objectives and deliver copy that aligns seamlessly.
 * Infuse creativity into the copy, ensuring it resonates with our diverse audience.
 * Adapt tone and style based on the specific platform and communication goal, balancing smart and witty with simplicity.
 * Stay updated on industry trends and competitor activities to ensure our copy remains fresh and relevant.
 * Work closely with designers to integrate copy seamlessly into visual elements, creating a cohesive and impactful final product.
 * Revise and iterate on copy based on feedback and performance metrics.
 * Contribute ideas and insights during brainstorming sessions to enhance overall campaign effectiveness.




Benefits




 * The chance to work on an industry-defining product in the creative space
 * Competitive pay
 * Health & wellness benefits
 * Learning & development budget
 * Option to work remotely (in person preferred, but we allow for remote work)
 * Flexibility with working hours - that means we don't believe in the traditional 9-5 work routine
 * Your own custom work machine with your requested specifications (and color 😉 )




We're looking for people with a take-charge attitude and a mindset to do something that impacts an entire industry! If you don't want to be yet another cog in the system and want to work on innovative and challenging problems, we'll be excited to have you.




About Aftershoot:  




At Aftershoot, we’re passionate about making the lives of photographers easier through AI. Our software empowers photographers to focus on their creative pursuits by automating the tedious aspects of photo culling and editing. Join us in our mission to innovate and elevate the photography post-processing experience.

title: Finance Copywriter
description:
About Groww




We are a passionate group of people focused on making financial services accessible to every Indian through a multi-product platform. Each day, we help millions of customers take charge of their financial journey. Customer obsession is in our DNA. Every product, every design, every algorithm down to the tiniest detail is executed keeping the customersʼ needs and convenience in mind. Our people are our greatest strength. Everyone at Groww is driven by ownership, customer-centricity, integrity and the passion to constantly challenge the status quo.




Are you as passionate about defying conventions and creating something extraordinary as we are? Letʼs chat.




Our Vision




Every individual deserves the knowledge, tools, and confidence to make informed financial decisions. At Groww, we are making sure every Indian feels empowered to do so through a cutting-edge multi-product platform offering a variety of financial services. Our long-term vision is to become the trusted financial partner for millions of Indians.




Our Values




Our culture enables us to be what we are — Indiaʼs fastest-growing financial services company. Everyone at Groww enjoys the autonomy and flexibility to bring their best work to the table, as well as craft a promising career for themselves.

The values that form our foundation are:

 * Radical customer centricity
 * Ownership-driven culture
 * Keeping everything simple
 * Long-term thinking
 * Complete transparency




Roles & Responsibilities:




Required:




 * Spearhead and manage content strategy for both small-scale and large-scale projects, harnessing strategy, digital, and brand design.
 * Develop internal marketing campaigns that translate marketing objectives across business units into clear and motivating creative strategies
 * Own ideation, conceptualization, and execution of Key Visuals and Promotion Campaigns to help drive marketing objectives by leveraging the content to shape the narrative in a visually compelling and provocative manner
 * Direct and supervise creative from concept through execution along with the Copy team
 * Manage deliverables and the design team. Collaborate across various teams to achieve the marketing goals
 * Provide clear creative direction, motivation, and inspiration to the design team
 * Work on design strategies that are insightful and stimulate good work
 * Enforce brand guidelines across all internal & external departments including businesses, marketing, acquisition, PR, etc.
 * Experience in both mainline & digital creative thinking would be preferred
 * Able to work in a fast-paced environment with the ability to understand creative briefs and generate unique ideas
 * Knowledge about investing will be a plus




Expertise and Qualifications




 * 4-5 years of experience in copywriting for advertising, digital, and social.
 * Has a passion or interest in finance, the industry and different products within.
 * Strong sense of creative storytelling, content writing, user experience, and marketing and possess ideation skills that stretch across various communication media
 * Experience balancing strategy and copy, leading and managing a team of copywriters and other stakeholders.
 * Ability to thrive as a collaborator/co-creator - willing to shape ideas as well as build on the ideas of others.
 * Good sense of brand guideline
 * Project Management
 * Take ownership of QC of all the assigned work

Copy Writer

 * Excellent time-management and organizational skills

title: Copy Writer
description:
676560BR

Introduction

At IBM, work is more than a job - it's a calling: To build. To design. To code. To consult. To think along with clients and sell. To make markets. To invent. To collaborate. Not just to do something better, but to attempt things you've never thought possible. Are you ready to lead in this new era of technology and solve some of the world's most challenging problems? If so, lets talk.

Your Role and Responsibilities

The Blue Studio is IBM’s internal creative team, responsible for the strategic evolution and expression of the IBM brand across every experience and encounter, internally and externally. The Blue Studio is part of IBM's Marketing function and supports all of IBM, horizontally, across all businesses, and vertically, from the top of the funnel to the bottom. The work crosses nearly every category of output: research and strategy, communications and content development, symbology and systems, digital and physical experiences, and tools and training. Our goal is to maintain modernity, sophistication, and tangibility, and to promote understanding of the IBM brand in the world.

Role

In the Blue Studio, your words matter. Here, you’ll become part of a creative, collaborative team, partnering with world-class strategists, designers, producers and creative directors to tell compelling stories about the technologies changing our world and the people who put them to work. Your primary responsibilities will be to:



 * Distill complex concepts into sharp headlines that capture attention and drive engagement
 * Craft scripted dialogue and voiceover that can inspire, elevate and explain
 * Dive deeper into topics with additional surround materials, including digital ads, blogs, emails, video scripts, white papers and more
 * Act as storyteller and steward of the brand, infusing IBM’s brand voice, style, and messaging into every deliverable
   
   
   

BLRMCC_23

#ISAICHQMCC24

CHQMCCRoles

IBMDCB

MCCJBID

Required Technical and Professional Expertise



 * 4+ years marketing or advertising writing (agency or in-house)
 * Superior English language writing skills with a keen eye for detail (diction, syntax and grammar)
 * Portfolio of work demonstrating success in primary responsibilities for the role
 * History of pitching ideas and presenting work to creative directors, partners and stakeholders
 * Comfortable with technology and IT wordage
   
   
   

Preferred Technical And Professional Expertise



 * Degree in English, creative writing, advertising, journalism or related area of study
 * Advertising or marketing agency experience
 * History of work with international clients
 * Professional social/broadcast media content
 * Collaboration with diverse, distributed teams through tools such as Box, Figma, Mural etc.
   
   
   

About Business Unit

IBM Corporate Headquarters (CHQ) team represents a variety of functions such as marketing, finance, legal, operations, HR, and more, all working together to solve some of the world's most complex problems, help our clients achieve success and build collaborative work environments for IBMers.

This job requires you to be fully COVID-19 vaccinated prior to your start date and proof of vaccination status will be required before your start date. During the Onboarding process you will be asked to confirm your vaccination status, in case you are unable to get vaccinated for any reason, you can let us know at that stage. Please let us know if you are unable to be vaccinated due to medical or religious reasons. IBM will consider such requests on a case by case basis subject to submission of required proof by the candidate before a stipulated date.

Your Life @ IBM

In a world where technology never stands still, we understand that, dedication to our clients success, innovation that matters, and trust and personal responsibility in all our relationships, lives in what we do as IBMers as we strive to be the catalyst that makes the world work better.

Being an IBMer means you’ll be able to learn and develop yourself and your career, you’ll be encouraged to be courageous and experiment everyday, all whilst having continuous trust and support in an environment where everyone can thrive whatever their personal or professional background.

Our IBMers are growth minded, always staying curious, open to feedback and learning new information and skills to constantly transform themselves and our company. They are trusted to provide on-going feedback to help other IBMers grow, as well as collaborate with colleagues keeping in mind a team focused approach to include different perspectives to drive exceptional outcomes for our customers. The courage our IBMers have to make critical decisions everyday is essential to IBM becoming the catalyst for progress, always embracing challenges with resources they have to hand, a can-do attitude and always striving for an outcome focused approach within everything that they do.

Are you ready to be an IBMer?

About IBM

IBM’s greatest invention is the IBMer. We believe that through the application of intelligence, reason and science, we can improve business, society and the human condition, bringing the power of an open hybrid cloud and AI strategy to life for our clients and partners around the world.Restlessly reinventing since 1911, we are not only one of the largest corporate organizations in the world, we’re also one of the biggest technology and consulting employers, with many of the Fortune 50 companies relying on the IBM Cloud to run their business. At IBM, we pride ourselves on being an early adopter of artificial intelligence, quantum computing and blockchain. Now it’s time for you to join us on our journey to being a responsible technology innovator and a force for good in the world.

Location Statement

When applying to jobs of your interest, we recommend that you do so for those that match your experience and expertise. Our recruiters advise that you apply to not more than 3 roles in a year for the best candidate experience.

For additional information about location requirements, please discuss with the recruiter following submission of your application.

Being You @ IBM

IBM is committed to creating a diverse environment and is proud to be an equal-opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, caste, genetics, pregnancy, disability, neurodivergence, age, veteran status, or other characteristics. IBM is also committed to compliance with all fair employment practices regarding citizenship and immigration status.

title: Content Writer
description:
Cvent is a leading meetings, events, and hospitality technology provider with more than 4,700 employees and nearly 21,000 customers worldwide, including 80% of the Fortune 100 companies, in more than 100 countries. Founded in 1999, the company delivers a comprehensive event marketing and management platform for event professionals and offers software solutions to hotels, special event venues, and destinations to help them grow their group/MICE and corporate travel business.

                                               

Cvent is looking for a Technical Writer with an otherworldly attention to detail, an ability to write clear concise prose, and a love for using those gifts to help people. You have the vocabulary of a lexicologist and the wisdom to know when to renounce it. You're immune to the allure of buzzwords, corporatese, and techno-babble. You're unafraid to barrage complete strangers with questions until you get it. If that someone is you, you'd be working with the team responsible for making learning about our products a smooth, fun, and rewarding experience—Support Operations. After receiving product training, you'll be creating and editing help content, and assisting in updating our knowledge base to meet the needs of our ever-evolving users.

 

 * Write and translate complex topics into customer friendly content.
 * Write, update, and edit help content that people actually want to read
 * Create content in a variety of mediums, including articles, images, GIFs, short videos, etc.
 * Assist in mentoring volunteer writers from across the company
 * Act as a user advocate

 

 * Strong sense of reader loyalty
 * Deadline-driven creative self-starter
 * Superb communication skills must be able to make difficult concepts digestible, engaging, and relatable. Your writing samples should demonstrate this strength.
 * Experience with myKB a plus

title: Writer-Editor
description:
Job Summary

This position is located in the Office of the Inspector General’s (OIG) Executive Secretariat Division. OIG is responsible for investigation, audit, fraud control, and other services related to District of Columbia government programs and operations. The Executive Secretariat Division coordinates the administrative work of the OIG, serving as a liaison between OIG’s operational units and supporting divisions, with the goal of inspiring every employee with innovative solutions that support world-class government oversight.

The Writer-Editor is responsible for managing the development and presentation of complex information by converting it to understandable terms for different levels and interests of audiences. The incumbent has overall responsibility for editorial review, readability analysis and copy-editing of audit, inspections and evaluations, and investigative reports, testimony, correspondence, internal OIG documents, and other material that will be used by a variety of stakeholders.

Duties And Responsibilities

Provides administrative and publication support duties for the Office of the Inspector General.

Responsible for the editing, writing, proofing, formatting, assembly, layout, and printing of the OIG’s published reports.

Writes, edits, and manages written materials for use in communicating information about audits, inspections and evaluations, investigations, and other OIG related services.

Prepares clear, logical, concise, and persuasive work products for varied audiences. The products will be based on complex sensitive issues and controversial results need to be presented in a concise, comprehensible, and meaningful manner for the intended audiences.

Interprets complex concepts and themes in documents, reconciling contradictions in the information presented, and using expository narrative to develop balanced treatments of controversial matters in the presentation of conflicting points of views.

Edits text for clarity and accuracy; applies a consistent set of style, grammar, and punctuation practices in editing documents; consults on design, graphics, and other illustrative materials; and reviews proposed publications for style, design, layout, and editorial aspects before their release. Evaluates the documents in terms of purpose, audience, scope, content, organization, and logic.

Perform other duties assigned.

Desired Qualifications

We are looking for individuals with outstanding writing, editing, and layout skills, and who can leverage Microsoft Word to its full potential, including creation and management of styles, Quick Parts and other fields, internal cross-referencing, automated outline numbering, and section headers/footers.

Experience Using SharePoint For Document Collaboration Is Preferred.

Writing Sample

Qualified candidates will be asked to supply writing samples that accurately show their writing and editing skills.

Work Environment

The work is normally performed in an office environment. Normal safety precautions are required.

Other Significant Facts

Duration of Appointment: Career Service

Pay Plan, Series, and Grade: CS-1082-12

title: Youtube Content Writer
description:
About GrowthSchool


 * GrowthSchool partners with the top 1% of instructors to create high-impact cohort-based courses on personal and professional growth for learners all over the world.
 * Backed by Sequoia Capital, Owl Ventures amp; 80+ angels including the likes of Kunal Shah, Ritesh Agarwal, Nikhil Kamath, and Tanmay Bhat to name a few.
 * Mentors come from brands like Amazon, Swiggy, Google, Apple, Meta, Microsoft, Hotstar, Freshworks, and many more.
   
   

About The Job Role

As a YouTube Content Writer at GrowthSchool, you'll be at the forefront of crafting engaging and informative long-form video content. Your role is to transform ideas into captivating scripts that resonate with our target audience.

Key Responsibilities


 * Content Ideation: Brainstorm and research video ideas that align with our brand and audience interests.
 * Scriptwriting: Craft engaging video scripts that captivate viewers, ensuring clarity, creativity, and adherence to YouTube best practices.
 * Keyword Optimization: Conduct keyword research and incorporate relevant keywords seamlessly into scripts to improve video discoverability.
 * Storytelling: Develop a narrative structure for videos that keeps viewers engaged from start to finish.
 * Visual Scripting: Collaborate with our video production team to create visual cues and directions for each video.
 * Research: Stay updated on industry trends, competitor content, and emerging topics to ensure our videos remain relevant.
 * Engagement Strategies: Suggest strategies to boost audience engagement, such as call-to-actions, polls, and interactive elements.
   
   

Skills amp; Competencies:


 * 1-2 Years of experience minimum in long-form content writing
 * Content Research, content writing, and copywriting skills
 * Familiarity with YouTube platform, SEO, and best practices for content creation on the platform.
 * Ability to come up with creative ideas and brand campaigns
 * Being a content creator is a plus ;)
   
   

Values Of GrowthSchool Team Members


 * Intent over degree: We are not looking for people with fancy degrees but the ones who have the intent to make a difference.
 * Learning mindset: A person who always wants to learn and grow himself along with the company and his team.
 * Ability to ask questions: We need people who can critically question ideas and not just accept them as they are.
 * Being an owner, not a renter: Our company’s culture is not to micromanage people so we want people who can come up with an ownership mindset and be a leader in their own work.
   
   

Perks Of Working With GrowthSchool


 * Competitive salary, additional Allowances, and time-to-time surprises for additional efforts.
 * Access to world-class learning courses and resources for personal and professional growth
 * ESOPs because we value each individual's contribution no matter how big or small
 * Health Insurance for you and your family member

title: Content Writer
description:
Role Description

We are looking for Content Writers with 1-3 years of experience to take full responsibility for the content creation process (from strategy to execution). Our ideal candidate is someone with a flair for writing content that is well-researched, engaging, and customized to diverse sectors, brands, requirements, and formats. Strong interpersonal and communication skills to effectively coordinate with clients, colleagues, and partners, are a must.

 

This is an in-office role (5 days a week). Early applicants and immediate joiners will be given preference.

 

Responsibilities

 * Interact with clients to create campaign plans, source briefs, and deliver work on time
 * Undertake content marketing initiatives to achieve client goals & objectives
 * Collaborate with our leadership, content, and design teams to produce great work
 * Conduct online research to add to client inputs, and create rich, engaging content
 * Write high-quality content for websites, brochures, social media posts, emailers, videos, landing pages, web banners, case studies, newsletters, blogs, presentations, etc.
 * Edit, proofread, and improve content to create engaging, error-free work
 * Create and manage the editorial calendar/workflows, and maintain project trackers
 * Post content on social media platforms, using relevant tags and hashtags
 * Measure and optimize performance on an ongoing basis to deliver optimal results
 * Stay up to date with industry trends, emerging technologies, and current events to generate relevant and engaging content ideas

 

Skills/Qualifications:

 * Bachelor’s degree (in commerce, marketing, business management, or journalism & mass comm.)
 * 1-3 years’ experience in content-writing and copy-writing for brands & businesses
 * Strong marketing and communications mindset, with the ability to address business goals through strategic campaigns & initiatives
 * Prior experience in client relationship management
 * Superior written and spoken communication skills in English
 * Ability to write both long-form and short-form content in an engaging style
 * Proficient computer skills, including MS-Office Suite (Word, PPT, Excel)
 * Familiarity with keyword placement and SEO writing
 * Comfort using AI-enabled tools/models to enhance efficiency, productivity & accuracy
 * Excellent understanding of social media platforms (best practices, optimization techniques, etc.)

 

You will love working with us if:

 * You are quality-focused and believe in doing it right the first-time
 * You are versatile, and enjoy writing different kinds of content
 * You are confident, yet, open-minded and keen to learn
 * You are a natural team player, but can also work independently on projects
 * You are disciplined, responsible and take complete ownership for deliverables

 

Most importantly, we value people with strong ethics. Humility, integrity, positivity and teamwork are hallmarks of our team. Those who believe in these values can look forward to building a long, successful career with us.

 

In your resume/application, please mention your current CTC.

title: Copy Writer
description:
676559BR

Introduction

At IBM, work is more than a job - it's a calling: To build. To design. To code. To consult. To think along with clients and sell. To make markets. To invent. To collaborate. Not just to do something better, but to attempt things you've never thought possible. Are you ready to lead in this new era of technology and solve some of the world's most challenging problems? If so, lets talk.

Your Role and Responsibilities

The Blue Studio is IBM’s internal creative team, responsible for the strategic evolution and expression of the IBM brand across every experience and encounter, internally and externally. The Blue Studio is part of IBM's Marketing function and supports all of IBM, horizontally, across all businesses, and vertically, from the top of the funnel to the bottom. The work crosses nearly every category of output: research and strategy, communications and content development, symbology and systems, digital and physical experiences, and tools and training. Our goal is to maintain modernity, sophistication, and tangibility, and to promote understanding of the IBM brand in the world.

Role

In the Blue Studio, your words matter. Here, you’ll become part of a creative, collaborative team, partnering with world-class strategists, designers, producers and creative directors to tell compelling stories about the technologies changing our world and the people who put them to work. Your primary responsibilities will be to:



 * Distill complex concepts into sharp headlines that capture attention and drive engagement
 * Craft scripted dialogue and voiceover that can inspire, elevate and explain
 * Dive deeper into topics with additional surround materials, including digital ads, blogs, emails, video scripts, white papers and more
 * Act as storyteller and steward of the brand, infusing IBM’s brand voice, style, and messaging into every deliverable
   
   
   

#ISAICHQMCC24

CHQMCCRoles

IBMDCB

MCCJBID

Required Technical and Professional Expertise



 * 4+ years marketing or advertising writing (agency or in-house)
 * Superior English language writing skills with a keen eye for detail (diction, syntax and grammar)
 * Portfolio of work demonstrating success in primary responsibilities for the role
 * History of pitching ideas and presenting work to creative directors, partners and stakeholders
 * Comfortable with technology and IT wordage
   
   
   

Preferred Technical And Professional Expertise



 * Degree in English, creative writing, advertising, journalism or related area of study
 * Advertising or marketing agency experience
 * History of work with international clients
 * Professional social/broadcast media content
 * Collaboration with diverse, distributed teams through tools such as Box, Figma, Mural etc.
   
   
   

About Business Unit

IBM Corporate Headquarters (CHQ) team represents a variety of functions such as marketing, finance, legal, operations, HR, and more, all working together to solve some of the world's most complex problems, help our clients achieve success and build collaborative work environments for IBMers.

This job requires you to be fully COVID-19 vaccinated prior to your start date and proof of vaccination status will be required before your start date. During the Onboarding process you will be asked to confirm your vaccination status, in case you are unable to get vaccinated for any reason, you can let us know at that stage. Please let us know if you are unable to be vaccinated due to medical or religious reasons. IBM will consider such requests on a case by case basis subject to submission of required proof by the candidate before a stipulated date.

Your Life @ IBM

In a world where technology never stands still, we understand that, dedication to our clients success, innovation that matters, and trust and personal responsibility in all our relationships, lives in what we do as IBMers as we strive to be the catalyst that makes the world work better.

Being an IBMer means you’ll be able to learn and develop yourself and your career, you’ll be encouraged to be courageous and experiment everyday, all whilst having continuous trust and support in an environment where everyone can thrive whatever their personal or professional background.

Our IBMers are growth minded, always staying curious, open to feedback and learning new information and skills to constantly transform themselves and our company. They are trusted to provide on-going feedback to help other IBMers grow, as well as collaborate with colleagues keeping in mind a team focused approach to include different perspectives to drive exceptional outcomes for our customers. The courage our IBMers have to make critical decisions everyday is essential to IBM becoming the catalyst for progress, always embracing challenges with resources they have to hand, a can-do attitude and always striving for an outcome focused approach within everything that they do.

Are you ready to be an IBMer?

About IBM

IBM’s greatest invention is the IBMer. We believe that through the application of intelligence, reason and science, we can improve business, society and the human condition, bringing the power of an open hybrid cloud and AI strategy to life for our clients and partners around the world.Restlessly reinventing since 1911, we are not only one of the largest corporate organizations in the world, we’re also one of the biggest technology and consulting employers, with many of the Fortune 50 companies relying on the IBM Cloud to run their business. At IBM, we pride ourselves on being an early adopter of artificial intelligence, quantum computing and blockchain. Now it’s time for you to join us on our journey to being a responsible technology innovator and a force for good in the world.

Location Statement

When applying to jobs of your interest, we recommend that you do so for those that match your experience and expertise. Our recruiters advise that you apply to not more than 3 roles in a year for the best candidate experience.

For additional information about location requirements, please discuss with the recruiter following submission of your application.

Being You @ IBM

IBM is committed to creating a diverse environment and is proud to be an equal-opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, caste, genetics, pregnancy, disability, neurodivergence, age, veteran status, or other characteristics. IBM is also committed to compliance with all fair employment practices regarding citizenship and immigration status.
